name: GG Marmont small shoulder bag
description: The GG Marmont collection spotlights sophisticated leather in dark tones to welcome Pre-Fall. Crafted in quilted chevron patent leather, this small shoulder bag with a zip closure underlines its contemporary silhouette in black, complete with light gold toned hardware.

name: Large GG tote bag
description: Signature pieces appear in the men's Fall Winter collection with a sporty attitude. Crafted from the Original GG canvas, timeless shapes and color palettes convey a contemporary mood through subtle details, such as the Web and embossed Gucci logo. This large tote bag, in beige and ebony canvas, features multiple pockets and top handles.

name: Women's Princetown slipper
description: The line presents a range of signature styles. The iconic Princetown slipper is defined by its elegant silhouette, refined materials and the classic Horsebit. This model is enhanced by the light gold-toned hardware.

name: Mini GG crossbody bag
description: The latest small leather accessories line for men explores new functionalities and colorways. Crafted from the Original GG canvas in Rosso Ancora red, this timeless mini crossbody bag conveys a contemporary mood through subtle details, such as the subtle Web detail and new fidlock closure.

name: Small GG crossbody bag
description: Signature pieces appear in the men's Fall Winter collection with a sporty attitude. Crafted from the Original GG canvas, timeless shapes and color palettes convey a contemporary mood through subtle details, such as the Web and embossed Gucci logo. This small cross-body bag, in Rosso Ancora red canvas, features multiple pockets and an adjustable shoulder strap.

name: Passport case with GG Shadow
description: For the latest collections, the GG motif continues to be revisited with a contemporary twist. Presented in Gucci Rosso Ancora red, this passport case features the signature monogram with an optical effect to create a sense of dimension.

name: Women's Horsebit pump
description: The iconic Horsebit defines this pair of patent leather pumps. The rounded toe and the adjustable ankle closure complete the style, enhancing its preppy spirit.

name: Cotton headband and wristbands set
description: From the 1970s 'Gucci Tennis' sneaker to the present day, the House continues to express its connection to the sport with signature pieces focusing on heritage as well as innovation. This striking sports set is comprised of a headband and two wristbands, all made from a cotton blend terry cloth bearing the House's instantly-recognisable Web motif.

name: Medium duffle bag
description: Introduced as part of the men's Fall Winter 2024, this duffle bag draws from an archive design and has been re-envisioned by Creative Director Sabato De Sarno. The refined leather has a soft grainy touch presented in here in Rosso Ancora red. The shoulder strap is adjustable and detachable in a green and red Web canvas while a Gucci logo detail completes the refined design crafted with a high frequency embossing technique.

name: Women's Gucci Tennis 1977 sneaker
description: The latest collection explores the archives, adding contemporary touches to vintage styles as a tribute to both the brand's past, present and future. This pair of Gucci Tennis 1977 is defined by the iconic green and red Web.

name: Gucci B large shoulder bag
description: Introduced for the men's Fall Winter 2024 collection, the Gucci B bag draws its name from an archive design, re-envisioned here with a relaxed silhouette that drapes across the body. The refined leather has a soft grainy touch and presents this version with Gucci Rosso Ancora red GG optical effect. The shoulder strap is adjustable and detachable, with an additional D-ring for attaching items.

name: Original GG canvas visor with Web
description: From the 1970s 'Gucci Tennis' sneaker to the present day, the House continues to express its connection to the sport with signature pieces focusing on heritage as well as innovation. This structured visor is presented in Original GG cotton canvas and enhanced with a green and red Web stripe.

name: Medium backpack with Gucci logo
description: Introduced on the men's Fall Winter 2024 runway, the new backpack silhouette blends sleek lines with a sporty attitude. This version in beige and ebony Original GG canvas provides a sophisticated backdrop for the subtle Gucci logo in relief, created with a high frequency embossing technique. Other iconic details include a green and red Web detail on the outside zip pocket.

name: Medium backpack with Gucci logo
description: Introduced on the men's Fall Winter 2024 runway, the new backpack silhouette blends sleek lines with a sporty attitude. This medium version in Gucci Rosso Ancora red Original GG canvas provides a sophisticated backdrop for the subtle Gucci logo in relief, created with a high frequency embossing technique. Other iconic details include a green and red Web detail on the outside zip pocket.

name: 18k Horsebit stud earrings
description: Gucci celebrates the 20th anniversary of the signature Horsebit jewelry line with classic and iconic pieces in 18k yellow gold. This pair of stud earrings is defined by a half-horsebit variation of the signature detail.

name: Silk neck bow with GG Shadow
description: The House's heritage motifs shine through eye-catching new prints. Crafted from pure silk, this red and purple neck bow reveals a GG print with optical effect.

name: Silk neck bow with GG Shadow
description: The House's heritage motifs shine through eye-catching new prints. Crafted from pure silk, this camel and dark brown neck bow reveals a GG print with optical effect.

name: GG large duffle bag
description: From the 1970s 'Gucci Tennis' sneaker to the present day, the House continues to express its connection to the sport with signature pieces focusing on heritage as well as innovation. This versatile and functional duffle bag appears in a white GG Supreme Tender.

name: Thin belt with Round Interlocking G buckle
description: Versatile and essential pieces are enriched with the House's most defining codes. Crafted from black patent leather, this thin belt is defined by an archival iteration of the House's monogram hardware.

name: Super mini bucket bag with GG Shadow
description: Reinterpreted in a contemporary way, the GG monogram is slightly offset with a drop shadow to create a sense of dimension. Here, the signature motif appears atop this super mini bucket bag crafted from Gucci Rosso Ancora red and multicolor canvas with GG Shadow.

name: Women's Screener sneaker
description: Influenced by classic trainers from the 1970s, the Screener sneaker is named for the defensive sports move. Here the emblematic style is presented in white leather with an embossed GG leather insert

name: GG Marmont small shoulder bag
description: The GG Marmont line has always combined innovative material and design, and for Pre-Fall, two outside zip pockets further emphasize the geometry and sophistication of the matelass√© chevron leather. Ivory leather lining, light gold toned hardware, and an adjustable leather and chain shoulder strap completes this small shoulder bag in the Gucci Rosso Ancora hue.

name: GG Marmont small shoulder bag
description: The GG Marmont line has always combined innovative material and design, and for Pre-Fall, two outside zip pockets further emphasize the geometry and sophistication of the matelass√© chevron leather. description: Since its debut, the Ace sneaker has become a mainstay of the House's narrative. A new version of the characteristic low-top silhouette is presented in the latest collection, featuring unique details.

name: Viscose jersey mini skirt
description: Signature patterns have been re-envisioned in unexpected versions, juxtaposed with new silhouettes on jackets, oversized shirts and pajama ensembles. This mini skirt is made from a soft viscose jersey and is enriched with a Gucci embroidery.

name: Viscose jersey hooded sweatshirt
description: Signature patterns have been reenvisioned in unexpected versions, juxtaposed with new silhouettes on jackets, oversized shirts and pajama ensembles. This oversized hooded sweatshirt is made from viscose jersey and enriched with a Gucci embroidery.

description: The signature fashion jewelry line featuring an italic variation of the Gucci script appears in a shiny new finish, enriching necklaces, bracelets and other accessories as a central charm or pendant. Here the detail defines this chain bracelet in gold-toned metal.

name: Wool cashmere polo top
description: Light, refined fabrics are complemented by a pastel colour palette. This slim fit polo top is made from a light blue wool cashmere and is defined by an Interlocking G embroidery across the chest.

name: Oxford cotton shirt with GG Shadow
description: The GG monogram explores fresh interpretations. On leather, wool, and cotton the signature GG motif is slightly offset with a drop shadow to create a sense of dimension. This slim fit shirt is made from GG Oxford cotton with a contemporary optical effect.

name: Wool boucl√© polo dress
description: White is accented by navy blue to create a quintessential yet charming wardrobe centered around well-cut pieces. This sleek polo dress is made from a wool boucl√© and is completed with tonal Round Interlocking G enamel buttons.

name: Wool boucl√© cardigan
description: White is accented by navy blue to create a quintessential yet charming wardrobe centered around well-cut pieces. This V-neck cardigan is made from a textured wool boucl√© and completed with Round Interlocking G enamel buttons.

The shoulder strap is adjustable, and the bag comes with an additional Web canvas strap, allowing for versatile ways to wear this large bag. This style is crafted from olive green patent leather.

description: The piece is part of Sabato De Sarno's debut collection, offering a modern take on the House's well-known codes and symbols. In a conversation between classic and contemporary, this caban expresses modernity through the techno gabardine fabric, which gives it a sportswear-inspired feel. The front features a leather patch with a debossed Gucci logo that subtly contrasts the textures provided by the rib knit neck.

name: Cady cr√™pe wool silk jacket

The silhouette reveals a double-breasted construction as well as peak lapel, complete two flap pockets and one breast pocket.

Gucci transcribes its heritage, creativity, and innovation into a plenitude of collections. From staple items to distinctive accessories, from the everyday wardrobe to special occasions, the House's beloved motifs embellish ready-to-wear, handbags, shoes, and other collections.

name: Cotton velvet pant
description: This classic pair of pants in stretch cotton velvet is part of the Gucci narrative that redefines the idea of femininity with hints to the concept of freedom that fashion experienced in the '90s. The design features a high waistline, side pockets and a button and zip closure.

name: Gucci Diana mini tote bag with anaconda trim
description: The line presents a range of signature styles designed in celebration of beautiful night skies, with metallics, sparkling details and delicate color palettes. This mini Gucci Diana bag reveals a new copper shade alongside a tonal anaconda trim and light copper-toned Double G hardware.

name: Gucci Diana mini tote bag
description: Marking the House‚Äôs first in-person fashion show since February 2020, Gucci Love Parade unfolded along Los Angeles' walk of fame. Inspired by the timeless nature of old-Hollywood glamour, the collection presents contemporary takes on traditional pieces. This Gucci Diana mini tote bag is presented in camel and ebony GG canvas with crystal - a refined addition to the emblematic silhouette.

name: Gucci Diana mini GG crystal tote bag
description: Combining recognizable elements of the House, the Gucci Diana is defined by its bamboo handles and Double G hardware. Featuring GG crystal embroidery, this mini tote bag is further accentuated by two bands, a playful reference to the bands used to keep handles in shape.

name: Gucci Diana mini tote bag
description: Cruise 2023 Gucci Cosmogonie crafts a bridge that continuously builds upon itself, traversing time through a myriad of references. First used in the post-war era when traditional materials were hard to come by, bamboo has become not only a symbol of the spirit of reinvention that runs throughout the House's designs but one of Gucci's most recognizable signatures.

name: Thin patent Double G belt
description: Crafted from white patent leather, this belt's shiny finish catches the light. A mix of materials and colors appear throughout the Gucci Love Parade collection to tell a story defined by classic Hollywood glamour and self-expression.

name: Thin patent Double G belt
description: Crafted from black patent leather, this belt's shiny finish catches the light. A mix of materials and colors appear throughout the Gucci Love Parade collection to tell a story defined by classic Hollywood glamour and self-expression.

description: A ski mask fit for glossy mountain peaks, with sporty details and technical features. Here the pink frame is decorated with the name of the House, while a green and red Web strap appears at the back. A yellow guccissima lens completes this style with a vibrant logo feel.

description: This chain bracelet features the emblematic Double G logo. The House symbol appears repurposed in a delicate gold finish, while a central pendant is embellished with pearl resin and glinting crystals to create the appearance of a delicate flower.

description: Blending pink and beige, neutrals set the tone across a selection of handbags and accessories, putting the emphasis on textures, materials, and functionality. Here, it enriches this small bag and is further enhanced with a gold-toned Double G emblem.

name: GG Matelass√© small bag
description: Matelass√© leather continues to come to the fore of the Creative Director's designs in new and unique ways each season. With a super soft finish, the signature material is reimagined once again as a part of Gucci Love Parade with a textured geometric motif. The design presents a contemporary approach to the '90s logo trend that appears throughout the House's latest collections. Here, it enriches a rectangular shoulder bag in black.

description: The Gucci Horsebit 1955 is introduced in beige and ebony GG Supreme canvas and a medium size. The collection unifies details first introduced on the original bag that inspired the line from over six decades ago with a modern spirit, highlighting the Horsebit. Part of Gucci‚Äôs genetic code, the double ring and bar design has been established as one of the most distinctive elements among the House symbols borrowed from the equestrian world. description: Pastel colors add a delicate note to the collection, adding a retro aesthetic to classic silhouettes. This pair of chunky sneakers is presented in a mix of different materials with an Interlocking G print at the back. An emblematic material, white and beige GG Supreme canvas is framed by oatmeal and light pink colored leather.

name: Jackie 1961 mini shoulder bag
description: Characterized by a shiny finish that captures the light, patent leather is both playful yet refined. Presented as a part of the Gucci Love Parade collection, this mini version of the Jackie 1961 interprets the glossy material in vibrant orange. The bold hue speaks to the fashion show's homage to self-expression.

name: GG Marmont half-moon-shaped mini bag
description: With a crescent silhouette and textured white leather, this mini bag has a defined retro feel. Each collection is a journey through different decades and eras, combining vintage elements with archival codes or contemporary details to create new designs that exist outside of space and time. The petite accessory reflects this fascination with the past, a concept that runs throughout the world of GG Marmont.

name: GG Marmont half-moon-shaped mini bag
description: With a crescent silhouette and textured black leather, this mini bag has a defined retro feel. description: The Gucci Aria collection takes references from the archives of the '90s and early '2000s, with pieces inspired from Tom Ford's era in Gucci. The new idea of femininity shows glamorous details, such as lace, crystals and sheer fabrics. This pair of slingback shoes are presented in beige and ebony Original GG canvas for a strong logo feel.

name: Women's GG slingback pump
description: The Gucci Aria collection takes references from the archives of the '90s and early '2000s, with pieces inspired from Tom Ford's era in Gucci. The new vision elevates the scent to higher levels of intensity for those looking for a declaration of love free from the rules and definitions of society. Designed to act as emblems of the connection between like-minded, eccentric lovers, Gucci Guilty Eau de Parfum Intense Pour Femme is an Ambery Floral Woody fragrance that rewrites the Gucci Guilty Pour Femme signature‚Äôs essential core.

Playing with the theme of sports and leisure, the blue and red detail defines this pair of leather sneakers. The shoe's chunky silhouette adds a retro feel to the design.

name: Women's GG embossed sneaker
description: This sneaker's chunky silhouette gives it a playful, retro feel. Gucci's collections continue to look to other eras, finding inspiration in the everyday and bringing them to the present. Crafted from GG embossed leather, the monogram motif adds a logo twist.

name: Women's GG sneaker
description: First used in the 1970s, the GG logo was an evolution of the original Gucci rhombi design from the 1930s, and from then it's been an established symbol of the House's heritage. Behind every logo lies the tradition and value of the House, an everlasting medium one can wear again and again. Following the idea of constant change and experimentation, different iterations of the logo have been presented each collection. The maxi GG, a new version of the historic monogram, animates this shirt.

description: The Padlock is introduced as a mini bag in a mix of leather and canvas in different colors. Adding to the styles contrasting elements, is a brown leather shoulder strap and handle. Playing with different materials and shades, the House's designs have a hybrid feel.

name: Jackie 1961 chain wallet
description: The world of Jackie 1961 evolves with the introduction of a continental wallet with delicate chain strap allowing it to be worn as a mini bag. The gold-toned piston detail pays homage to the original bag. Here, the accessory is presented in white leather.

name: Jackie 1961 chain wallet
description: The world of Jackie 1961 evolves with the introduction of a continental wallet with delicate chain strap allowing it to be worn as a mini bag. The gold-toned piston detail pays homage to the original bag. Here, the accessory is presented in the House's monogram canvas.

The canvas has come to the front of each collection decade after decade to become a hallmark of the House. Here, the classic palette defines this small-sized Ophidia top handle bag.

name: Ophidia GG small top handle bag
description: The world of Ophidia continues to evolve with new iterations each season. The top handle bag is presented as part of the Epilogue collection with a detachable shoulder strap. The vintage influenced square shape is accentuated by the House Web stripe and Double G hardware‚Äîa contemporary take on a Gucci archival belt buckle from the '70s. Crafted from the House's monogram canvas, the style has a strong logo feel.

description: Colors tell a story throughout Gucci Love Parade. One of the House's most emblematic materials, the GG Supreme is inspired by an archival design from the '30s. Traditionally presented in beige and ebony, the canvas is presented in a beige and white combination as an ode to timeless pieces and everlasting design. Here, the pattern defines this small-sized Ophidia top handle bag.

name: Wool dress with contrast trim
description: A white wool dress with black detail that trims the silhouette. The Epilogue collection conveys the idea that fashion's old rules should be left behind and pieces should be timeless‚Äìnot just in fashion for one season.

name: Wool polo shirt with Horsebit
description: Traditional motifs inspired by seaside looks have been reinterpreted with a new palette and embellished with details such as gold-toned Horsebit hardware. This sophisticated polo shirt is presented in camel wool and enriched with a contrasting off white trim.

description: A white wool shirt with black detail that trims the silhouette. The Epilogue collection conveys the idea that fashion's old rules should be left behind and pieces should be timeless‚Äìnot just in fashion for one season.

name: Square-frame sunglasses
description: Part of Gucci‚Äôs genetic code, the Horsebit, borrowed from the equestrian world, has been established as one of the most distinctive elements among the House symbols. Here, the Horsebit is reimagined in a petit version along the temples of this new line of sunglasses.

name: Oversize square-frame sunglasses
description: Part of Gucci‚Äôs genetic code, the Horsebit, borrowed from the equestrian world, has been established as one of the most distinctive elements among the House symbols. Here, the Horsebit is reimagined in a petit version along the temples of this new line of sunglasses.

name: 25* Goldie Red, Rouge De Beaut√© Brillant
description: Gucci Beauty presents Rouge De Beaut√© Brillant, a special lip color set apart by unique benefits. Serving as an in-between for a sheer and satin lipstick, the hybrid long-lasting dual-action formula delivers 24 hours of moisture and a beautifully pigmented shine. Beautiful shine and glowing color combine in vibrant hues of reds, pinks, corals and nudes. Formulated with nourishing and antioxidant ingredients, the creamy texture highlights and preserves the natural beauty of the mouth, so lips look fuller and plumped to perfection. A new vintage shape and design inspired by vintage brooches bears witness once again to the Creative Director‚Äôs passion for collectable objects of desire.

name: Gucci Guilty EDT Pour Femme, 90ml eau de toilette
description: Freedom and unconventional love inspire the new Gucci Guilty Eau de Toilette pour Femme bottle design and packaging, revealing the notion of women who are truly liberated. The flacon is designed to echo the silhouette of the counterpart men‚Äôs fragrance, reflecting the equal standing of the women and men they represent.

name: Women's leather platform espadrille
description: An essential style, the espadrille sandal is re-introduced in white leather with a cord wedge-shaped heel for the Epilogue collection in order to show the timelessness of true style. Cut in antique-toned gold, the archival Double G enhances the front.

name: Women's leather platform espadrille
description: An essential style, the espadrille sandal is re-introduced in black leather with a cord wedge-shaped heel for the Epilogue collection in order to show the timelessness of true style. Cut in antique-toned gold, the archival Double G enhances the front.

name: Women's leather platform espadrille
description: Brought to life in black leather for the Epilogue collection is the espadrille sandal with a cord wedge-shaped heel, defined by the Double G symbol that has continued to inspire style throughout the decades.

name: Double G key ring with crystals
description: As a concluding chapter to the story of leaving behind fashion‚Äôs old rules, the Epilogue collection is comprised of pieces that experiment with the concept of time. Taking a contemporary approach to an antiques-inspired design is this crystal encrusted ring in the shape of a barrel key defined by a Double G head.

name: Jackie 1961 card case wallet
description: Inspired by the world of handbags, the Jackie 1961 line evolves with the introduction of a petite card case wallet. A gold-toned piston details pays homage to the first Jackie bag, crafted in 1961. Here, the accessory is presented in black leather.

name: Jackie 1961 card case wallet
description: Inspired by the world of handbags, the Jackie 1961 line evolves with the introduction of a petite card case wallet. A gold-toned piston details pays homage to the first Jackie bag, crafted in 1961. Here, the accessory is presented in the House's monogram canvas.

name: Gucci Horsebit 1955 small shoulder bag
description: The Horsebit has become synonymous with the brand. Tracing back to Gucci's equestrian roots, the double ring and bar design is a piece of the House's heritage. The Epilogue collection's Gucci Horsebit 1955 unifies this original details first introduced over six decades ago with a modern spirit in a small beige and ebony GG Supreme shoulder bag completed by a special mechanism that adjusts the length of the shoulder strap so it can be carried on one shoulder or cross body.

description: Everyday cotton felted jersey is elevated through the Gucci lens. Here the lightweight material comes to the fore with a blue and red Web detail on the front of this sweatshirt. Presented in ivory, the women's style features a fixed hood and a front pocket.

description: Taking cues from the archives, the Web is a key element of Gucci's collections and reinforces the homage paid to Gucci's past. Paired on this ink blue sweatshirt with the vintage Gucci logo, it stands as a reference to the equestrian heritage of the House.

name: Sweatshirt with Web and Gucci label
description: Reminiscent of a vintage tracksuit, this hooded sweatshirt features a front zip detail and contrast red piping. Emblematic House codes, like the green and red Web stripe and the Gucci jacquard label, enrich the design.

name: GG Supreme print silk shorts
description: The GG Supreme pattern gets reinterpreted into ready-to-wear silhouettes crafted from refined fabrics, for an unexpected take on activewear. Here, the emblematic motif animates silk twill shorts enhanced by colorful lam√© stripes down the sides. The elastic waistband adds a sporty feel.

name: GG Supreme print silk jacket
description: The GG Supreme pattern gets reinterpreted into ready-to-wear silhouettes crafted from refined fabrics, for an unexpected take on activewear. Here, the emblematic motif animates a silk twill jacket enhanced by colorful lam√© stripes down the sides. The elastic trim adds a sporty feel.

name: Wool GG jacquard cardigan
description: An oversize wool cardigan with the GG motif plays into proportion dressing that permeates the collection. The House name is reinterpreted in different ways each season with a different play on its lettering. Pieces with versatile ways to wear and style embrace each person who is part of the House‚Äôs individual spirit.

name: Ophidia bi-fold wallet
description: First used in the 1970s, the GG logo was an evolution of the original Gucci rhombi design from the 1930s, and from then it's been an established symbol of Gucci's heritage. The wallet combines the signature motif with the Web stripe‚Äîa timeless pairing that pays homage to Gucci's roots.

The collection unifies details first introduced on the original bag that inspired the line from over six decades ago with a modern spirit, highlighting the Horsebit. Part of Gucci‚Äôs genetic code, the double ring and bar design has been established as one of the most distinctive elements among the House symbols borrowed from the equestrian world.

name: Jackie 1961 mini shoulder bag
description: The reintroduction of the Jackie bag in a mini size for Fall Winter 2020 presents a new take on a historical Gucci icon. Brought back to the forefront, the recognizable shape is presented in GG Supreme canvas and enhanced with an additional, detachable shoulder strap. Attached to the bag with a buckle closure, the second strap adds a contemporary feel to the archival style, providing new ways to wear—from top handle, shoulder to cross body. Pieces with versatile ways to wear and style embrace each person who is part of the House’s individual spirit. The Jackie 1961: available exclusively in Gucci stores and on Gucci.com

This reversible cardigan is crafted from a GG jacquard wool mohair blend, in a fresh expression of the House's iconic monogram.

description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. A classic combination of the House's most defining codes‚Äîthe GG motif and Web stripe‚Äîthe world of Ophidia continues to evolve, incorporating new shapes and silhouettes each season. Thanks to its long leather handles, the style can also be carried as a shoulder bag.

description: The Double G‚Äîan archival reprisal of the House's signature emblem‚Äîdefines these earrings, characterized by an aged gold finish for a vintage appeal. Glass pearl drops speak to the dreamlike narrative felt throughout the collection, while the earring has a unique feature where it extends into a longer length.

name: Women's Gucci Off The Grid sneaker
description: Part of the Gucci Tennis 1977 collection, the low-top sneaker is introduced within a line of accessories and ready-to-wear presented for Pre-Fall 2020 made from recycled materials and trims, supporting the House's commitment to sustainability. Gucci Off The Grid is the first collection from Gucci Circular Lines‚Äîa concept created to support the House's vision for circular production. Gucci Off The Grid uses recycled, organic, bio-based and responsibly sourced materials. Regenerated nylon, crafted using recycled sewing thread and trims displays the GG pattern against an opaque background in black.

name: Women's Princetown leather slipper
description: The Princetown brings together different chapters from the House's history for Pre-Fall 2020. Since its introduction, the slipper has become a mainstay in the House's collection. Here, crafted from white leather, the shoe combines two emblematic symbols from the archives that speak to Gucci's equestrian heritage: the Web and the Horsebit.

name: Women's Princetown leather slipper

description: Classic knitwear designs in sophisticated color schemes are enriched by refined details and emblematic House codes. description: The GG Supreme pattern gets reinterpreted into ready-to-wear silhouettes crafted from refined fabrics, for an unexpected take on activewear. Here, the emblematic motif animates a silk twill pant enhanced by colorful lam√© stripes down the sides. The elastic waistband adds a sporty feel.

description: Crafted from black embroidered GG tulle, this bra and briefs set completes several looks from the Pre-Fall 2020 collection. Diaphanous lingerie styles embody what the Creative Director described as a "beautiful clich√© of sexiness," a concept explored throughout the latest collections with hints to the idea of freedom that fashion experienced in the '90s.

name: Square sunglasses with Web
description: Square-shaped frames are contrasted by the heritage Web in green and red along the temples. The Double G detail in a gold tone adds a subtle nod to the House's logo.

name: Women's platform slide sandal
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Instantly recognizable emblems of the brand, logos enrich designs in new and unexpected ways. Behind every logo lies the tradition and value of the House, an everlasting medium one can wear again and again. Following the idea of constant change and experimentation, different iterations of the logo have been presented each collection. The maxi GG, a new version of the historic monogram, defines this pair of slide sandals.

description: The chain wallet in GG Supreme canvas and leather is introduced as part of the Gucci Horsebit 1955 accessories collection, defined by the double ring and bar design also found in Handbags. The folded snap-closure shape features several card slots and pockets, completed with a detachable chain strap.

description: A new silhouette introduced to the Gucci Horsebit 1955 line for Spring Summer 2020, the top handle has a domed shape with an optional leather shoulder strap, crafted from GG Supreme canvas and leather. The collection unifies details first introduced on the original bag that inspired the line from over six decades ago with a modern spirit, highlighting the Horsebit. Part of Gucci‚Äôs genetic code, the double ring and bar design has been established as one of the most distinctive elements among the House symbols borrowed from the equestrian world.

name: Women's GG Rhyton sneaker
description: The House‚Äôs emblematic sneaker is revisited as part of the Spring Summer 2020 collection where styles work together to create a language of self-expression. Defined by a thick sole and chunky construction, the Rhyton is presented in a mix of monogram fabrics and trimmed in leather and reflective material. Archival fabrics are reimagined through Gucci‚Äôs hybrid design narrative. On top of this shoe, GG Supreme is combined with a mini version in contrasting colors and with Original GG canvas for a retro logomania approach.

name: Mascara L'Obscur, black
description: In a buildable and versatile intense black hue, Gucci's Mascara L‚ÄôObscur encompasses the charm and mystery its name suggests. Encased within the House's covetable signature packaging, it is designed with a uniquely shaped brush and formula that grips the lashes for distinct results. L'Obscur was created for customized performance for those who dare to express and embrace their differences: from classic to bold, understated to punk. The ultra-rich creamy formula builds volume, while curling and lifting the lashes, adding length and definition with a long-wearing finish.

name: GG thong Web sandal
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Bringing several House elements together, the thong sandal combines green and red Web straps with a GG patterned sole and Interlocking G hardware in a modern mix of silver- and gold-toned metals.

name: Round-frame sunglasses
description: Crafted from acetate, these round sunglasses are characterized by a shiny tortoiseshell front and Web striped enamel temples, while the Interlocking G appears as a logo detail. Each season, House codes and symbols are reimagined and reintroduced in creative new ways.

name: Round-frame sunglasses
description: Crafted from acetate, these round sunglasses are characterized by a shiny black front and Web striped enamel temples, while the Interlocking G appears as a logo detail. Each season, House codes and symbols are reimagined and reintroduced in creative new ways.

description: First introduced in the '70s, the GG monogram is reworked in the beige and ebony wool pattern defining this cape. Designed with a point collar and slits for the arms, the design is embellished with gold-toned metal anchor buttons that speak to the nautical inspiration seen throughout the Cruise 2020 collection.

name: Square metal sunglasses
description: Now synonymous with the House's eyewear, fork-shaped temples are reimagined in a subtle design, with a square grey shaded lens and brown enamel to enrich the gold-toned metal frame. Among Gucci's most distinctive logos, the Interlocking G completes the accessory.

name: Square metal sunglasses
description: Now synonymous with the House's eyewear, fork-shaped temples are reimagined in a subtle design, with a square brown shaded lens and ivory enamel to enrich the gold-toned metal frame. Among Gucci's most distinctive logos, the Interlocking G completes the accessory.

description: Designed with a steel case and bracelet completed with a pastel pink mother of pearl dial, a new addition to the G-Timeless collection is introduced for Cruise 2020. At the center is the Mystic Cat motif, surrounded by other codes of the House displayed as the watch's indexes, including the star, Gucci bee and Interlocking G.

name: GG Flora print silk neck bow

The historic Flora motif, first presented by Vittorio Accornero in the '60s, is layered over the printed GG motif for a modern take on the two archival patterns.

name: Women's GG Gucci Tennis 1977 sneaker
description: The low-top sneaker is presented in Original GG canvas in its classic color combination of beige and ebony. The style combines different elements from the House's heritage such as the Gucci Tennis 1977 label, a textured GG motif at the sole and the Web‚Äîdetails which recall the House's connection to the world of sports and leisure.

name: G-Frame watch, 21x34mm
description: Refined and elegant by definition, this G-Frame watch comes with a mother of pearl dial and interchangeable yellow gold PVD mesh bracelet. The bee, a recurring House code, is present on the Web dial as indexes.

name: GG Flora print silk scarf
description: Part of a special collection with pastel-hued accents, this silk scarf combines two of the House's most distinctive designs. The historic Flora motif, first presented by Vittorio Accornero in the '60s, is layered over the House monogram for a modern take on the two archival patterns.

name: Diamantissima watch, 27mm
description: The Diamantissima watch features the signature Diamante pattern etched into the case. The tonal motif lends a delicate finish to the case.

name: Diamantissima watch, 32mm
description: The Diamantissima watch features the signature Diamante pattern etched into the case. The tonal motif lends a delicate finish to the case, contrasted with a black leather strap.

name: Gucci Horsebit 1955 small shoulder bag
description: Presenting new vibrant colors which highlight sophisticated leather, the Gucci 1955 Horsebit evolves as part of the latest collection with light gold-toned hardware, signature versatility and functionality. description: The initials of the Founder of the House, Guccio Gucci, alternate across this jacquard scarf. Presented in a contrasting color combination that alternates on the front and the back, the accessory is further accentuated by sparkling lam√©.

name: GG Marmont mini bag
description: Crafted from black matelass√© leather, the mini bag has a vertical design with a zipper closure and interior card slots. Part of the GG Marmont collection, the chain strap bag is defined by the emblematic Double G hardware‚Äîa contemporary take on a Gucci archival belt buckle from the '70s that has become a hallmark of the House.

name: GG Marmont medium wallet
description: Presented in a mix of the House's monogram canvas and black leather, this medium wallet is completed with a petite version of the House's Double G hardware. The interior features several card slots and pockets, securing with a snap closure.

name: Ophidia GG pouch
description: The zipped pouch is presented in GG Supreme canvas trimmed with the green and red Web stripe and Double G hardware‚Äîa classic combination of the House's most recognizable elements that defines the line. The world of Ophidia continues to evolve, incorporating new shapes and silhouettes for Cruise 2020.

name: Ophidia GG medium backpack
description: Reflecting the Creative Director's contemporary vision, the Ophidia lines come to life with a pop of fluorescent orange. Combining the GG motif and Web stripe with a modern hue launches signature travel pieces into the metropolis, such as this backpack complete with side pockets.

name: Ophidia GG medium backpack
description: Reflecting the Creative Director's contemporary vision, the Ophidia lines come to life with a pop of fluorescent green. Combining the GG motif and Web stripe with a modern hue launches signature travel pieces into the metropolis, such as this backpack complete with side pockets.

name: Ophidia GG medium backpack
description: With a hiking pack inspired shape, the medium-sized backpack is crafted in GG Supreme canvas contrasted with technical mesh details. A classic combination of the House's most recognizable elements‚Äîthe GG motif and Web stripe‚Äîthe world of Ophidia continues to evolve, incorporating new shapes and silhouettes. The bag is finished with the Double G hardware which defines the line.

name: Ophidia GG small crossbody bag
description: Mirroring the material's historic origins, GG Supreme is introduced in a timeless mix of blue and beige for Gucci Love Parade. The canvas has come to the front of each collection decade after decade to become a hallmark of the House. Here, the classic palette defines this Ophidia crossbody bag.

name: Ophidia GG small crossbody bag
description: A classic combination of the House's most recognizable elements‚Äîthe GG motif and Web stripe‚Äîthe world of Ophidia continues to evolve, incorporating new shapes and silhouettes. The half-moon design mixes emblematic references with the unique charms of the crossbody bag, a popular Gucci model since the late '50s. Crafted in GG Supreme canvas, it's trimmed with textured leather and topped with Double G hardware.

name: Cat eye acetate sunglasses
description: Influenced by the coveted styles of the '50s and '60s, the cat eye glasses have a shaped frame with an upsweep at the outer edges in black acetate that continues to the temples, ending in gold metal tips. Each side is enriched with a Web effect detail in pearlized pink and tortoiseshell acetate, topped with an Interlocking G detail.

name: Square metal and acetate sunglasses
description: A playful mix of materials, these sunglasses feature a shiny black acetate frame, contrasted by a gold-toned metal bridge. The temples are decorated with a sophisticated reinterpretation of the Web, crafted from tortoiseshell and mother of pearl effect acetate layers, trimmed by gold-toned metal details. With a vintage inspired soft acetate coating, the metal temple tips add a subtle contrast.

name: Gucci Bloom Ambrosia di Fiori, 100ml Eau de Parfum
description: Invoking a banquet of an ancient world, ambrosia was the sustenance of the Greek gods, thought to give immortality to those who drank it. The name of this precious nectar and the magic it evokes is woven into the scent‚Äôs vibrant bouquet. The blend begins with the original Gucci Bloom eau de parfum‚Äîa trio of Jasmine Bud extract, Tuberose, and Rangoon Creeper‚Äîcombined with new ingredients that intensify the floral fragrance: the rare Velvety Orris‚Äîderived from Iris resin‚Äîoriginally used by ancient Greeks and Romans as an essential oil, and Damascena Rose‚Äîharvested in the early morning to give the powerful rendition of the flower.

name: Broadway leather clutch with Double G
description: Crafted from textured black leather, the Broadway evening bag has a refined shape with an envelope flap closure. The Double G emblem accents the front with a twisted torchon design in a shiny gold tone.

name: G-Timeless watch, 38mm
description: Part of the G-Timeless collection, this automatic watch is designed with a black onyx stone dial, enriched with silver-toned indexes that take the form of the Gucci bee‚Äîa distinctive code of the House. The case continues into a steel bracelet that wraps around the wrist.

name: G-Timeless watch, 38mm
description: Designed with a steel case and bracelet completed with a silver sunbrushed dial for a tonal look, a new addition to the G-Timeless collection is introduced for Pre-Fall 2019. At the center is the Gucci bee, surrounded by other codes of the House displayed as the watch's indexes, including the star and Interlocking G.

name: Gucci Interlocking earrings with pearl
description: Contrasted by a spiked stud, a glass pearl combines with the crystal Interlocking G detail, forming a sparkling pendant that completes these earrings in shiny gold-toned metal.

name: GG Marmont wide belt with crystals
description: Inspired by an archival belt buckle, the Double G is enhanced with sparkling crystals atop this leather belt. Historical codes continue to be interpreted in new ways throughout Gucci's collections.

name: GG wool jacquard scarf
description: Crafted in organic wool in contrasting shades of beige and brown, this jacquard scarf is defined by the House's recognizable GG motif. Inspired by the original Gucci rhombi pattern, the design was first introduced in the '70s and continues to animate the latest collections.

name: Women's Screener sneaker with Web
description: Presented in an iteration of a archival-inspired fabric, the Screener is designed in a mix of ivory leather and white and silver light GG lam√©. Influenced by classic trainers from the '70s, the sneaker‚Äînamed for the defensive sports move‚Äîfeatures the Web stripe on the side and vintage Gucci logo.

name: Women's Ace embroidered platform sneaker
description: The classic Ace sneaker is set on a platform and shows the metallic gold bee against the Gucci Web. Since its debut, the Ace sneaker has become a mainstay of Gucci collections. The retro design is originally inspired by a Gucci sneaker from the 1970s and is continually reinterpreted and reintroduced into the new eclectic House narrative.

name: Women's leather lug sole loafer
description: A lug sole Horsebit loafer with blue rosebud print lining on the insole. A mainstay in Gucci history since the '50s, the classic Horsebit loafer bridges the past to the present. A homage to the House's heritage rooted in the equestrian world, the emblematic shape is reworked in a contemporary shape on a rubber lug sole.

description: Designed with a thick sole and bulky construction, the sneaker has a retro influence in leather with a vintage Gucci logo inspired by prints from the 1980s.

name: GG cotton lam√© top

name: Women's Rhyton glitter Gucci sneaker
description: Designed with a thick sole and bulky construction, the leather sneaker is remindful of the old school hip-hop scene and embodies the '90s influence pervading the Pre-Fall 2018 collection. Crafted in GG Supreme canvas, the accessory features some of the most distinctive House codes, like the green and red Web stripe‚Äîan homage to the equestrian world‚Äîand the Double G from the '70s archives, here reworked with a sophisticated take. The bag is completed with a detachable shoulder strap which allows it to be carried in multiple ways.

description: Mirroring the material's historic origins, GG Supreme is introduced in a timeless mix of blue and beige for Gucci Love Parade. The canvas has come to the front of each collection decade after decade to become a hallmark of the House. Here, the classic palette defines this Dionysus super mini bag.

name: Dionysus GG Supreme super mini bag
description: A structured GG Supreme canvas chain super mini shoulder bag with a key ring that can be used to attach this bag to a separate larger bag. The closure has the textured tiger head spur closure-a unique detail referencing the Greek god Dionysus, who in myth is said to have crossed the river Tigris on a tiger sent to him by Zeus. The accessory can also be worn as a crossbody bag.

name: Dionysus GG super mini bag
description: A new edition of the Dionysus is showcased throughout Gucci Love Parade. The bag is presented in a super mini size in an evolution of the classic GG Supreme canvas. A soft color palette, the petite design takes on a refined feel in the colors of beige and white, drawing attention to its recognizable tiger head hardware.

name: GG Marmont thin belt with pearls
description: The Double G, inspired by an archival design, is further enhanced by pearl effect studs. Pearls are a romantic symbol and are incorporated throughout Gucci's collections. The buckle sits on a leather strap in black.

name: GG pattern cotton blend socks
description: Calf and ankle socks continue to be an important part of Gucci's design aesthetic. Made from a stretch cotton blend, these socks feature the GG motif. The GG is a nearly 100 year old symbol that has been brought back into the forefront of Gucci's designs in unexpected ways.

name: Women's jumbo GG Princetown slipper
description: Instantly recognizable emblems of the brand, logos enrich designs in new and unexpected ways. Behind every logo lies the tradition and value of the House, an everlasting medium one can wear again and again. Following the idea of constant change and experimentation, different iterations of the logo have been presented each collection. The jumbo GG, a new version of the historic monogram, defines this pair of Princetown slippers.

description: A relaxed attitude speaks volume as casual pieces become indispensable. Sweatshirts, hoodies, and t-shirts are adorned with signature embellishments. This long-sleeved T-shirt is crafted from black medium cotton jersey and features the 3D Gucci 1921 print.

name: Knit cotton cardigan with patch
description: Gucci's Pre-Fall 2023 collection blends archival influence with functionality. The result is a contemporary narrative interspersed with traditional elements and symbols of the House. Part of the selection, this ivory knit cotton cardigan is defined by an Interlocking G patch and a blue and red Web intarsia.

name: Knit cotton polo T-shirt with Web

name: Nylon canvas reversible zip jacket
description: In a play between textures and applications, the most iconic motifs of the House enhance ready-to-wear designs throughout the Pre-Fall 2023 collection. Here, this reversible zip jacket embraces versatility in styling. Crafted from nylon canvas, it appears in dark blue on one side and off white on the other.

name: Jumbo GG pouch
description: The all-black jumbo GG design returns for Pre-Fall 2023 atop a selection of small leather pieces. A reinterpretation of Guccio Gucci's initials, the motif is an evergreen of the House that appears prominently in maxi size for an eye-catching logo feel. Here the emblematic leather defines this pouch complete with two card slots.

name: Jumbo GG zip around wallet
description: The all-black jumbo GG design returns for Pre-Fall 2023 atop a selection of small leather pieces. Here the emblematic leather defines this zip around wallet complete with card slots and bill compartments.

name: Jumbo GG card case
description: The jumbo GG continues to enrich the latest collections with a maxi version of the House logo. For Spring Summer 2024 the well-known motif in blue speaks to the start of the warmer season. Here it defines this card case with eight card slots.

name: Jumbo GG card case
description: The all-black jumbo GG design returns for Pre-Fall 2023 atop a selection of small leather pieces. description: This slide sandal is defined by the GG Supreme canvas, an archival symbol that pays homage to the House's founder, Guccio Gucci. A tonal rubber sole adds a dynamic element to the shoe.

description: The men's Cruise 2024 collection presents a contemporary silhouette. Trousers are paired with fitted jackets, while relaxed cargo pants worn with outerwear pieces offer a sporty edge. name: Jersey short
description: Ever since it first appeared in the 50s, the blue and red Web stripe has been one of the House's hallmarks. Here, the archival motif runs along the sides of these relaxed jersey shorts, completed by a sportswear-inspired elasticated waistband with drawstring.

name: Striped cotton shorts
description: Gucci transcribes its heritage, creativity, and innovation into a plenitude of collections. From the everyday wardrobe to special occasions, the House's beloved motifs embellish ready-to-wear pieces. Here, these striped cotton shorts feature a Gucci with Web label, a subtle detail that pays homage to the House's equestrian roots.

name: Ophidia GG card case
description: Imbued with retro-inspired references, the world of Ophidia evolves with the introduction of new small accessories. Defined by the signature beige and ebony GG Supreme canvas and the green and red Web stripe, the card case has a vintage appeal and features the precious Double G hardware.

name: Ophidia GG card case
description: Gucci heritage meets contemporary design with the continuation of Ophidia. This card case is presented in beige and ebony GG Supreme canvas, enriched with the historic Web. A contrasting interior completes the accessory with a modern hue.

name: Cotton jersey T-shirt with Gucci embroidery
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. The subtle motif, with just a touch of nostalgic inspiration, adorns a series of T-shirts and sweatshirts which channel refinement at the same time. Part of the selection, this piece is crafted from cotton jersey and presented in off white, a contrast trim completes the style.

name: Fluid drill tailored pant
description: The Cruise 2023 Gucci Cosmogonie collection was presented against the backdrop of the historic Castel del Monte in Italy. The show brought together aesthetics from distant eras and geographies and linked elements from the past with the present. description: Inspired by vintage travel and referencing Guccio Gucci‚Äôs beginnings at the Savoy Hotel in London, Gucci latest range of luggage pieces in a black variation of the GG Supreme canvas transforms heritage pieces into contemporary everyday accessories.

description: The jumbo GG continues to enrich the latest collections with a maxi version of the House logo. For Spring Summer 2024 the well-known motif in blue speaks to the start of the warmer season. Here it defines this duffle bag with top handles and adjustable shoulder strap.

description: The Gucci colour palette is constantly evolving to include more refined hues. New colourways and combinations result in the reinvention of signature styles with a contemporary feel. name: Gucci Savoy large duffle bag
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Reflecting the Creative Director's contemporary vision, the Ophidia lines come to life with a pop of fluorescent blue. Combining the GG motif and Web stripe with a modern hue launches signature travel pieces into the metropolis, such as this Gucci Savoy duffle bag.

name: Ophidia large duffle bag
description: The Gucci colour palette is constantly evolving to include more refined hues. New colourways and combinations result in the reinvention of signature styles with a contemporary feel. name: Ophidia large duffle bag

description: A series of looks from the Cruise 2023 Gucci Cosmogonie runway is composed of unexpected darkness. The deepest hues are animated by eclectic fabrics and paired with vivid touches of color. This brown bomber jacket is crafted from GG leather with tonal brown lining.

description: The Interlocking G has remained one of the most symbolic codes of the House since its introduction. The distinguishing emblem appears as a leather detail atop this tote bag. Completing the design's logo feel, the style is crafted from beige and ebony monogram canvas.

name: GG Marmont card case
description: First appearing as a belt buckle in the '70s, the Double G hardware has been reimagined for the latest Gucci collections. The tonal resin creates a contemporay rendition of this archival logo detail. This GG Marmont card case in black leather features ten card slots.

name: Wallet with Interlocking G
description: Inspired by vintage travel and referencing Guccio Gucci‚Äôs beginnings at the Savoy Hotel in London, Gucci latest range of small leather goods in black GG Supreme canvas transports heritage pieces into contemporary everyday accessories.

Behind every logo lies the tradition and value of the House, an everlasting medium one can wear again and again. Following the idea of constant change and experimentation, different iterations of the logo have been presented in each collection. The jumbo GG, a new, maximalist version of the historic monogram, animates a selection of ready-to-wear pieces, like this nylon canvas vest.

description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. A cotton jersey polo shirt featuring a blue and red Web around the sleeves. The preppy influence, a style that can be traced back to the Ivy League schools in the Northeast United States, continues to characterize the Gucci narrative.

description: Instantly recognizable emblems of the brand, logos enrich designs in new and unexpected ways. Behind every logo lies the tradition and value of the House, an everlasting medium one can wear again and again. description: The menswear selection for Cruise 2024 takes inspiration from the 1990s. Moleskin fabric and heritage patterns inspired by the House archives enrich new jackets, paired with denim pants for a modern edge. A Horsebit wool silk jacquard forms the base of this streamlined jacket, referencing the House's longstanding equestrian heritage.

name: Cotton poplin shirt
description: A concept continuously explored by Gucci, tailor-inspired pieces combine sartorial excellence and an eclectic vision. This cotton poplin shirt has pliss√® detail on front.

description: A sign of the House's ever-evolving design narrative, signature luggage pieces appear as a part of the latest collection in python leather. The striking dark grey tone in precious material mixes with the Double G logo, bringing this backpack's emblematic hardware to the fore.

name: Wool mohair formal jacket
description: Paying homage to the city that created a fascination with the movie industry and pop culture, Gucci Love Parade takes inspiration from Hollywood's glamour. Influenced by relaxed outfits of celebrities out and about, the collection balances contemporary layering of casual garments with sartorial ones. This wool mohair formal jacket has contrast detailing.

description: The plain, dark blue silk tie is enriched with an embroidered stripe and Interlocking G detail on the front. As well as adding visual texture to the silk, the emblem pays homage to the House's Founder Guccio Gucci.

description: The plain black silk tie is enriched with an embroidered stripe and Interlocking G detail on the front. As well as adding visual texture to the silk, the emblem pays homage to the House's Founder Guccio Gucci.

description: Emblematic motifs synonymous with the House enrich silk accessories, continuing the narrative seen in the ready-to-wear collection. This dark blue silk tie is decorated with the unmissable Double G emblem, appearing as a subtle detail at one corner.

name: Silk tie with Double G detail
description: Emblematic motifs synonymous with the House enrich silk accessories, continuing the narrative seen in the ready-to-wear collection. This black silk tie is decorated with the unmissable Double G emblem, appearing as a subtle detail at one corner.

name: Rectangular frame sunglasses
description: A Web enamel detail defines the temples of this pair of black sunglasses, completing the silhouette with a nod to the House's equestrian heritage. The rectangular construction combines both metal and acetate materials, resulting in a contemporary final design.

name: Navigator frame sunglasses
description: Contemporary navigator styles are redesigned through the Gucci lens. Here, acetate tips complete the temples of this gold-toned metal silhouette. An enamel Web stripe enriches the design as a subtle nod to the House's equestrian origins.

name: Navigator frame sunglasses
description: Contemporary navigator styles are redesigned through the Gucci lens. Here, tortoiseshell acetate tips complete the temples of this gold-toned metal construction. Engraved ridges enrich the silhouette for an unusual design twist.

name: Rectangular frame sunglasses
description: A narrow rectangular frame defines this pair of sunglasses in gold-toned metal, recalling popular styles from the '90s. A Web enamel detail and the Interlocking G feature along the temples, completing the silhouette with archival references.

description: Reimagining the material's historic origins, GG Supreme is presented in black as part of Gucci Love Parade. The canvas has come to the front of each collection decade after decade to become a hallmark of the House. Here, the classic palette defines this pair of Rhyton sneakers.

name: G-Timeless multibee watch, 38 mm
description: Part of the G-Timeless collection, this automatic watch is designed with a steel case and bracelet. The watch is characterized by a yellow gold sunbrushed dial and sapphire glass with an anti-reflective coating. At the center are bees, a signature symbol of the House.

name: G-Timeless multibee watch, 38 mm
description: Part of the G-Timeless collection, this automatic watch is designed with a steel case and 18k gold bracelet. The watch is characterized by a silver sunbrushed dial and sapphire glass with an anti-reflective coating. At the center are yellow gold pvd bees, a signature symbol of the House.

name: GG cotton intarsia cardigan
description: Codes that have become synonymous with the House remain a source of inspiration for the Creative Director. Originally created in the 1930s as an homage to Founder Guccio Gucci, the distinctive GG motif defines this cardigan knit in contrasting colors.

name: Double G and polka dot silk pocket square
description: House codes continue to enrich classic accessories. First appearing in the '70s, the distinctive Double G is synonymous with the Gucci narrative. The unmistakable emblem decorates this blue silk pocket square in a contrasting shade of yellow, interspersed with polka dots for a whimsical feel.

name: Men's Screener sneaker with Web
description: Influenced by classic trainers from the '70s, the Screener sneakers‚Äînamed for the defensive sports move‚Äîfeature the Web stripe on the side and the vintage Gucci logo. A pastiche of different influences that span across decades, the latest collections continue to reference old school shapes and materials inspired by vintage sportswear.

name: Crossbody bag with Interlocking G
description: The signature GG Supreme canvas is an evergreen of the House. Soft and malleable, it is crafted from a coated microfiber fabric. Here it appears in a black variation for this crossbody bag. An Interlocking G tag completes the design with a distinctive logo feel.

name: Striped cotton poplin shirt
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. A striped Double G design lends a light-hearted twist to a classic sartorial staple, while the GG embroidery on the pocket pays homage to the House's origins.

description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. The GG motif is reworked into an allover embroidery, contrasting this polo's dark blue stretch cotton base. An off-white and green striped collar completes the vintage inspired design.

name: GG stretch cotton polo
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. A blue allover GG defines this white polo‚Äîbringing a surprising and refined twist to its stretch cotton piquet construction. The style is accentuated by a metal button placket and a contrasting blue and red striped collar.

name: Polo with Interlocking G stripe
description: A distinctive detail of the Cruise 2020 collection, the Interlocking G stripe runs down the sleeves of this off-white stretch cotton piquet polo, with blue contrast collar. Reminiscent of logo tapes typically found on vintage tracksuits, the side band serves as a sporty play on the historical Gucci logo.

name: Polo with Interlocking G stripe
description: A distinctive detail of the Cruise 2020 collection, the Interlocking G stripe runs down the sleeves of this black stretch cotton piquet polo, with beige contrast collar. Reminiscent of logo tapes typically found on vintage tracksuits, the side band serves as a sporty play on the historical Gucci logo.

name: Oversize technical jersey jacket
description: A distinctive detail of the Cruise 2020 collection, the Interlocking G stripe runs down the sleeves of this oversize jacket, crafted from black technical jersey. Reminiscent of logo tapes typically found on vintage tracksuits, the side band serves as a sporty play on the historical Gucci logo.

name: Loose technical jersey jogging pant
description: A distinctive detail of the Cruise 2020 collection, the Interlocking G stripe runs down the sides of this jogging pant, crafted from black technical jersey. Reminiscent of logo tapes typically found on vintage tracksuits, the side band serves as a sporty play on the historical Gucci logo.

name: Ophidia GG medium backpack
description: The Gucci color palette is constantly evolving to include more refined hues. New colorways and combinations result in the reinvention of signature styles with a contemporary feel. This Ophidia backpack is presented in a grey and black variation of the GG Supreme canvas, reflecting Gucci's ability to modernize signature design elements.

name: Ophidia GG medium backpack
description: The Ophidia shoulder bags, totes, and top handle bags are presented in GG black denim for Cruise 2024, complete with silver-toned hardware for a touch of metallic contrast. This Ophidia backpack is presented in a blue and black variation of the GG Supreme canvas, reflecting Gucci's ability to modernize signature design elements.

name: GG Black belt bag
description: Presented in a black and grey combination, the GG motif takes on a contemporary look in a slim belt bag. The design is further enriched with an adjustable nylon strap featuring the Web in blue and red.

name: Ophidia GG wallet
description: Mirroring the material's historic origins, GG Supreme is introduced in a timeless mix of blue and beige for Gucci Love Parade. The canvas has come to the front of each collection decade after decade to become a hallmark of the House. Here, the classic palette defines this wallet from the world of Ophidia, completed by the Web stripe in blue and red.

name: Ophidia GG wallet
description: The bi-fold wallet is presented in GG Supreme canvas trimmed with the green and red Web stripe and Double G hardware‚Äîa classic combination of the House's most recognizable elements that defines the line. The world of Ophidia continues to evolve, incorporating new shapes and silhouettes for Cruise 2020.

name: Ophidia GG wallet
description: Gucci heritage meets contemporary design with the continuation of Ophidia. This wallet is presented in beige and ebony GG Supreme canvas, enriched with the historic Web. A contrasting interior completes the accessory with a modern hue.

name: Neo Vintage GG Supreme card case
description: The slim card case is part of a collection of vintage inspired leather accessories in GG Supreme featuring an oval leather tag with metal feline head, a now-established code of the House.

name: Cotton bib shirt
description: An elegant formal shirt crafted from cotton poplin and enhanced with front bib detail. The style is completed with a tailored fit and bow tie collar.

name: G-Timeless watch, 42mm
description: The House Web stripe, in its most recognizable green and red combination, is printed on this G-Timeless watch along the steel mesh bracelet and continuing onto the center dial.

name: G-Timeless watch, 42mm
description: Part of the G-Timeless collection, this automatic watch is designed with a black onyx stone dial, enriched with silver-toned indexes that take the form of the Gucci bee‚Äîa distinctive code of the House. The case continues into a steel bracelet that wraps around the wrist.

name: Interlocking G cotton T-shirt
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. The Gucci vintage logo was inspired by prints from the eighties. The retro-style motif is presented with an extended Web as part of Cruise 2023 Gucci Cosmogonie on this long sleeve cotton jersey T-shirt.

name: Men's leather Horsebit loafer with Web
description: Crafted from soft black leather, the loafer's refined shape is enriched with a combination of two of the House's most distinct codes: the Web stripe and Horsebit. Since the introduction of its classic shape in the 1950s, the preppy-inspired shoe has continued its influence, redesigned in new forms and materials. The foldable back heel gives the classic design a contemporary appeal.

name: Cotton poplin shirt
description: An elegant formal shirt crafted from cotton poplin and enhanced with front pin-tuck details. The style is completed with a tailored fit and collar.

name: Silver cufflinks with Double G
description: The Double G, inspired by an archival design from the '70s‚Äîa hallmark era of the House‚Äîdefines this pair of cufflinks, crafted from 925 sterling silver with an aged finish.

name: GG canvas bucket hat
description: Archival Gucci motifs feature prominently in logo-defined pieces. Here, the distinctive GG canvas is displayed against this bucket hat. A subtle Double G detail completes the style.

name: GG canvas bucket hat
description: Crafted from monogram canvas, this bucket hat is completed by a tonal leather trim. Enhanced by the historic Double G detail on the side, both the archival references and the shape speak to the vintage feel that permeates the House's design narrative.

name: GG canvas bucket hat with Double G
description: Presented in tonal monogram canvas, the shape of this bucket hat is accentuated by textured leather trims. The style is finished with the Double G‚Äîan archival reprisal of the House's signature emblem.

name: Men's GG Screener sneaker
description: Influenced by classic trainers from the '70s, the Screener sneakers‚Äînamed for the defensive sports move‚Äîfeature the Web stripe on the side and the vintage Gucci logo. A new play on the House's monogram, this pair of sneakers features a new maxi version of the emblematic GG canvas.

name: Fitted velvet jacket
description: An evening jacket in Gucci's fitted silhouette is offered in black velvet with satin details. The soft, narrow shoulders, wider lapel, and slim sleeves point to its archival inspiration, while a skinny structured cut gives it a modern edge.

name: GG Black crossbody bag
description: The small crossbody bag, designed with a softly structured rectangular shape that recalls traditional camera cases, in GG Supreme canvas. Presented in the black and grey combination of the House motif, the bag is completed with a wide nylon stripe in blue and red Web.

name: Ophidia GG belt bag
description: Introduced within the Ophidia line, the belt bag is crafted from GG Supreme canvas combined with the distinctive combination of the House Web with Double G hardware.

name: Ophidia GG toiletry case
description: Gucci's latest travel selection takes its roots from 1900s; the heyday of luxury luggage. Part of the Ophidia line, the toiletry case perfectly compliments other accessories of the same line. Crafted from grey and black GG Supreme canvas, it is defined by the distinctive Double G hardware. The interior of the zip pouch is complete with an open pocket.

name: GG cotton socks with Web
description: Archival elements are brought to the forefront of the Spring Summer 2019 collection. An evolution of the original Gucci rhombi design, the GG pattern has become an established symbol of the House. The monogram motif is presented here on a pair of cotton socks and combined with the classic Web.

name: GG cotton blend socks
description: Archival elements are brought to the forefront of the latest collection. An evolution of the original Gucci rhombi design, the GG pattern has become an established symbol of the House. The monogram motif is presented here on a pair of blue and beige cotton socks and combined with a Web detail.

name: GG and rhombus motif silk tie
description: A silk tie decorated by geometric rhombus shapes and the initials of the House's Founder‚ÄîGuccio Gucci. The design combines different tonalities of blue for a three-dimensional effect.

name: GG canvas track bottoms
description: Part of the concept of hybridization permeating the House's narrative universe, this jogging pant is crafted from GG cotton canvas, in a classic combination of beige and ebony, a material often used in tailoring pieces and traditional silhouettes.

name: T-shirt with Gucci Blade print
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. A slightly heavier quality of cotton jersey defines the T-shirts for Spring Summer 2019, resulting in an enhanced retro appearance. Designed with an oversize fit, this piece features the Gucci Blade print‚Äîa recurring motif of this season‚Äîpresented in green and red, distinctive colors that speak to the House's equestrian roots.

name: T-shirt with Gucci Blade print
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Designed with an oversize fit, this piece features the white and red Gucci Blade print‚Äîa recurring motif of this season. A slightly heavier quality of cotton jersey defines the T-shirts for Spring Summer 2019, resulting in an enhanced retro appearance.

name: Gucci Dive watch, 45mm
description: In silhouette that mirrors the recognizable details of a diver's watch, the Gucci Dive has a contemporary appeal with a black matte dial and nylon Web strap.

name: G-Timeless watch, 38mm
description: Part of the G-Timeless collection, this classic watch is designed with a traditional sensibility, juxtaposed with codes inspired by Gucci's new aesthetic. House motifs are displayed on the dial, including the bee, the star and the heart.

name: Aviator sunglasses
description: A historical House code inspired by the equestrian world, the Web is repurposed in new ways each season. In these aviator shades, the stripe becomes a discreet enameled detail underlining the end piece, linking the frame to the temples. Crafted from black acetate, this design is highlighted by metal frame profiles and completed by a bar on top of the bridge. The temple tips feature a cut-out segment.

name: Aviator sunglasses
description: A historical House code inspired by the equestrian world, the Web is repurposed in new ways each season. In these aviator shades, the stripe becomes a discreet enameled detail underlining the end piece, linking the frame to the temples. Crafted from black acetate, this design is highlighted by metal frame profiles and completed by a bar on top of the bridge. The temple tips feature a cut-out segment.

name: Ophidia GG small backpack
description: Mirroring the material's historic origins, GG Supreme is introduced in a timeless mix of blue and beige for Gucci Love Parade. The canvas has come to the front of each collection decade after decade to become a hallmark of the House. Here, the classic palette defines this small Ophidia backpack.

name: Ophidia GG small backpack
description: A versatile style that can be used as a travel accessory or a bookbag, the backpack continues to be an important silhouette in the world of Gucci, offered in a variety of sizes and interpretations. Part of the ever-expanding world of Ophidia, it's crafted in GG Supreme canvas with textured leather trim. The inlaid green and red Web detail and Double G hardware are steeped in the House's rich history, referencing symbols incorporated in Gucci collections since the '50s.

name: Ophidia GG small backpack
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Reflecting the Creative Director's contemporary vision, the Ophidia lines come to life with a pop of fluorescent fuchsia. Combining the GG motif and Web stripe with a modern hue launches signature travel pieces into the metropolis, like this small backpack. Inside and outside pockets complete the functionality of this accessory.

name: Ophidia GG small messenger bag
description: Mirroring the material's historic origins, GG Supreme is introduced in a timeless mix of blue and beige for Gucci Love Parade. The canvas has come to the front of each collection decade after decade to become a hallmark of the House. Here, the classic palette defines this small Ophidia messenger bag.

name: Ophidia GG small messenger bag
description: A classic combination of the House's most recognizable elements‚Äîthe GG motif and Web stripe‚Äîthe world of Ophidia continues to evolve, incorporating new shapes and silhouettes. A versatile design originally inspired by mail carriers, postmen, and bicycle couriers, the messenger bag became a popular item in '80s urban streetwear. Here, the crossbody bag is crafted in GG Supreme canvas trimmed with textured leather and topped with Double G hardware.

name: GG Marmont card case
description: A fold-over card case, distinguished by our signature Double G hardware. It's calfskin leather, heat-stamped to achieve a boar effect, gives it a textured appearance.

name: Men's Screener GG sneaker
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. A pastiche of different influences that span across decades, the Cruise 2019 collection references old school shapes and materials inspired by vintage sportswear. Influenced by classic trainers from the '70s, these sneakers mix leather with Original GG canvas, featuring the Web stripe and Gucci vintage logo, treated for an allover distressed effect.

name: Rectangular-frame metal sunglasses

The temples are decorated with a sophisticated reinterpretation of the Web, crafted from tortoiseshell and mother of pearl effect acetate layers, trimmed by gold-toned metal details. With a vintage inspired soft acetate coating, the metal temple tips add a subtle contrast.

name: G-Timeless watch, 38mm
description: First developed by Gucci in the 1950's, the Web continues to pay homage to the House's roots. The stripe motif adorns the dial and the strap of this Pre-Fall 2018 G-Timeless.

name: Animalier leather card case

name: Animalier leather wallet

description: First used in the 1970s, the GG logo was an evolution of the original Gucci rhombi design from the 1930s, and from then it's been an established symbol of Gucci's heritage. For Cruise 2019, the GG pattern has been brought back into ready-to-wear, paying homage to Gucci's roots. Here it is presented in a bold way with contrast colors and a formal cut.

name: Rectangular-frame acetate sunglasses
description: With a retro inspired style, this pair of acetate sunglasses are defined by their rectangular shape and grey lenses. For a logo touch, the design is enhanced by the House's Web stripe on the temples.

description: A chunky cable knit oversize cardigan featuring bold stripes in colors that are reminiscent of the Web. The preppy influence, a style that can be traced back to the Ivy League schools in the Northeast United States, continues to characterize the Gucci narrative. In the latest collections, the concept transcends the original lifestyle and is now identified by House codes and androgynous silhouettes.

name: GG jacquard jogging pant
description: First used in the 1970s, the GG logo was an evolution of the original Gucci rhombi design from the 1930s, and from then it's been an established symbol of Gucci's heritage. In a shape that is infused with a retro feel, the track bottoms reach past their athletic origin to a street style that is rooted in the now.

description: The Gucci Trademark line combines motifs and hexagonal charms with the name of the House. From the cut-out heart to the padlock charm, playful symbols continue to distinguish a selection of rings, necklaces, bracelets and earrings for Pre-Fall 2024.
