description: The Interlocking G logo appears in elegant new interpretations for Pre-Fall 2024. Precious black onyx stone is paired with yellow 18k gold and embellished with sparkling diamonds. This pair of hoop earrings can be matched with other accessories from the same line.

description: The Interlocking G logo appears in elegant new interpretations for Pre-Fall 2024. Refined rose gold is complemented by vivid green agate stone and sparkling diamonds. This pair of hoop earrings can be matched with other accessories from the same line.

The House was established in Florence, and the collection connected Gucci‚Äôs beginnings with that of the city‚Äôs historic past and decades since. The brooch is an important accessory presented on the runway, it ties the past with the present with the Double G design framed by crystals.

Here, the Ophidia GG mini top handle bag is presented in pale green GG denim, enriched with tonal leather trims. A light gold-toned hardware completes the accessory with a metallic contrast.

name: Oxford cotton shirt
description: Earthy tones and muted shades of beige mix with vibrant touches of color to anticipate the arrival of a new season. This elevated shirt is presented in white cotton with self-covered buttons, making for a versatile layering piece that transcends the seasons.

name: Jumbo GG wool skirt
description: Essential pieces in the Cruise 2024 collection are embellished with signature Gucci motifs for the wardrobe. This beige and brown skirt is crafted from GG striped wool and further enriched with gold-toned buttons. A versatile piece that truly transcends the seasons.

name: Tweed skirt
description: Gucci puts a twist on tweed by innovating the traditional textile with the House's Web design. The new collection's tweed blazers and skirts, which can be worn separately or as a suit, exude colorful style. This skirt in ivory wool tweed is elevated by a braided ribbon trim, while an Interlocking G detail decorates the front with a subtle logo feel.

name: GG wool lam√© jacket

Presented in a combination of light green and silver, the sparkling material‚Äôs retro appeal emphasizes the vintage inspiration of this women's jacket, designed with three front patch pockets and gold-toned metal buttons.

name: Cotton shirt with detachable collar

name: Micro G print silk shirt

Classic elements still permeate the House's aesthetic, blending seamlessly with the contemporary for an updated yet never-out-of-style wardrobe. Here, this silk shirt is presented in pink and defined by an allover Micro G print.

name: GG damier print silk shirt
description: Sophisticated and subtle patterns decorate a selection of styles for the Cruise 2024 collection. The House's historical monogram is presented here across a silk base, bringing an elegant twist to the silhouette.

name: Silk cr√™pe de chine shirt

name: Women's sandal with Double G
description: Lending a contemporary and sporty touch, these flat sandals with velcro straps offer all-day ease. Crafted from ivory GG crystal canvas, the accessory is defined by a delicate Double G hardware on the upper band.

name: Women's Horsebit sandal

name: Women's Horsebit mid-heel slide sandal
description: Guccio Gucci continues to make an appearance throughout every collection through immediately recognizable logo details. Here, this pair of white leather slide sandals is defined by the Horsebit hardware with crystals.

name: Women's Horsebit mid-heel slide sandal
description: Guccio Gucci continues to make an appearance throughout every collection through immediately recognizable logo details. Here, this pair of black leather slide sandals is defined by the Horsebit hardware with crystals.

name: Women's GG slingback ballet flat
description: Taking inspiration from archives of the 1990s and early 2000s, the women's shoes selection shows glamorous details, such as lace, crystals and sheer fabrics. This pair of ballet flats is presented in a black mesh with a sparkling GG motif.

name: Women's Gucci Ripple sneaker
description: The Gucci Ripple sneaker features innovative stitching techniques which emulate the fluidity of water. The leather design is complete with three-dimensional elements which flow from the upper to the outsole, such as an Interlocking G leather patch with a 3D effect and a Gucci lettering metal hardware.

name: Women's Gucci Ripple sneaker
description: The Gucci Ripple sneaker features innovative stitching techniques which emulate the fluidity of water. The leather design is complete with three-dimensional elements which flow from the upper to the outsole, such as an Interlocking G leather patch with a 3D effect and a Gucci lettering metal hardware.

name: Women's Horsebit sandal
description: House details add a logo touch to this pair of sandals. Inspired by the origins of the brand, the emblematic Horsebit defines the shoe. Presented in light blue leather, this pair of high-heeled sandals is completed by an ankle buckle closure.

name: Women's Horsebit sandal
description: House details add a logo touch to this pair of sandals. Inspired by the origins of the brand, the emblematic Horsebit defines the shoe. Presented in brown leather, this pair of high-heeled sandals is completed by an ankle buckle closure.

name: Women's GG Princetown slipper
description: Since its debut, the Princetown slipper has become a mainstay of Gucci collections. Unconventional yet entirely modern, the influential accessory is a contemporary interpretation of the Horsebit loafer, envisioned for the latest collection in black and grey GG denim.

name: Women's Gucci Jordaan loafer
description: The GG denim line expands to include a range of women's shoes for the new season. Three different GG denim shades in light blue, dark blue and black add texture to staple House styles. Here it defines this classic women's Gucci Jordaan loafer.

name: Women's sandal with Double G
description: Lending a contemporary and sporty touch, these flat sandals with velcro straps offer all-day ease. Crafted from black and grey GG denim, the accessory is defined by a delicate Double G hardware on the upper band.

name: Cropped tweed jacket with sequins
description: Gucci puts a twist on tweed by innovating the traditional textile with the House's Web design. The new collection's tweed blazers and skirts, which can be worn separately or as a suit, exude colorful style. Here, this cropped jacket is presented in a light pink cotton tweed with sequin embroidery and is further enhanced by Interlocking G palladium-toned buttons.

name: Cotton poplin dress
description: Imbued with an inherent ladylike feel, this dress is crafted from lilac cotton poplin. Conveying the idea that fashion's old rules should be left behind and pieces should be timeless, classic silhouettes are presented throughout the latest collections and reworked through contemporary details.

name: Jackie 1961 GG backpack
description: New iterations of the Jackie 1961 continue even throughout the men's bags line. This GG Supreme backpack is imbued with a certain elegance owing to soft structure and roll top design. The renown piston hardware decorates the front, while a zip closure and top handle allows for easy wear.

name: Mask-shaped frame sunglasses
description: For the Pre-Fall 2023, these sunglasses are defined by a mask shape. Crafted from light grey injection, the silhouette is embellished by a Square G detail on the lenses.

name: GG Supreme Oxford cotton shirt
description: Essential pieces in the Cruise 2024 collection are embellished with sophisticated and subtle patterns. Part of the selection, this shirt is crafted from Oxford cotton and presented in light blue, while the House's historical motif continues to lend an archival touch, offering a contemporary twist on a classic wardrobe staple.

name: Gucci Bassinet-Stroller combo
description: Gucci expands its children's collection with its first Bassinet-Stroller combo, in collaboration with Inglesina. Archival codes, such as the GG monogram and Web, are seamlessly woven into the lightweight designs. Committed to enhancing the wellness of little ones while offering maximum functionality and integrated safety, this bassinet and stroller combo accompanies the child through the different phases of growth.

name: Gucci Stroller
description: Gucci expands its children's collection with its first stroller, in collaboration with Inglesina. Archival codes, such as the GG monogram and Web, are seamlessly woven into the lightweight designs. Committed to enhancing the wellness of little ones while offering maximum functionality and integrated safety, this stroller accompanies the child through the different phases of growth.

name: Belt with Double G buckle and bamboo
description: Looks from the Cruise 2024 selection combine functionality with a stylish touch. This striking belt is presented in cuir leather and enriched with a rectangular Double G buckle with bamboo.

name: Gucci Savoy suitcase
description: This item is part of the Gucci Savoy line, a selection of travel pieces that pay homage to Guccio Gucci‚Äôs beginnings as a porter at the London hotel. The rigid suitcase symbolized the emergence of modern travel, suitable for anyone who wanted to carry their belongings near or far. Here the classic silhouette is revisited through the Gucci lens, crafted from beige and ebony GG Supreme canvas and complete with the green and red Web.

name: Cotton jersey cropped sweatshirt
description: A relaxed attitude speaks volume as casual pieces become indispensable. Sweatshirts, hoodies, and t-shirts with drop shoulders, cropped lengths, and generous fits are adorned with signature embellishments. Crafted in a light felted cotton jersey, this relaxed sweatshirt features an eye-catching Gucci embroidery across the front.

name: Original GG diaper bag
description: Crafted from beige and ebony Original GG canvas, the motif mixes with House Web to give this diaper bag a strong logo touch with archival references. The design features a zip pocket on the inside and five outside pockets. The accessory is compatible with the coordinating stroller and can be attached with the two backpack straps.

name: Fine cashmere top with Interlocking G
description: The season's sleek silhouette draws inspirations from the 1990s, with slim-fitting tops and slightly low-slung bottoms. Fine, lightweight knitwear tops fit like second skin, while skirts and pants are worn with relaxed elegance. Crafted from a fine pink cashmere, this top is defined by an Interlocking G patch.

name: Ophidia small tote bag
description: The Ophidia line is further elevated through new sizes and styles including variations with top handles as well as shoulder straps, allowing for versatile wear. The signature Double G hardware completes this black leather design.

name: Silk skirt with Interlocking G
description: The season's sleek silhouette draws inspirations from the 1990s, with slim-fitting tops and slightly low-slung bottoms. Fine knitwear featuring mohair, wool and other natural fibers emphasize the shoulderline, while skirts and pants hit just below the waistline. This elevated skirt has been crafted from black silk duchesse and is defined by an Interlocking G zip puller.

name: Jackie 1961 mini shoulder bag
description: The crescent-shape that denotes the Jackie 1961 has been restyled for the Fall Winter women's 2023 collection. Presented in mini dimensions, the silhouette appears in transparent Plexiglas. Crafted from innovative new materials, this design takes the wearer on a journey from Gucci's past to the present.

name: Women's loafer with Horsebit
description: Combining the stylistic elements of boots and moccasins, this burgundy leather loafer features a lightweight rubber lug sole paired with an elegant silhouette. The signature Horsebit hardware elevates the style, adding a sophisticated element to an everyday design.

name: Jackie 1961 large shoulder bag
description: The crescent-shape that denotes the Jackie 1961 has been restyled for the Fall Winter women's 2023 collection. Presented in oversized dimensions, the silhouette has a soft construction in white and black leather. Crafted from materials in the House archive, this design takes the wearer on a journey from Gucci's past to the present.

name: Flora print silk scrunchie
description: The historical Flora print continues to narrate collections, imbuing each selection with a romantic touch. Reimagined with a contemporary feel, the signature pattern appears atop this white silk scrunchie.

name: Ophidia case for iPhone 15 Pro
description: The Ophidia case for iPhone 15 Pro is presented in the House's monogram canvas. First used in the 1970s, the GG logo was an evolution of the original Gucci rhombi design from the 1930s, and from then it's been an established symbol of Gucci's heritage.

name: Ophidia case for iPhone 15
description: The Ophidia case for iPhone 15 is presented in the House's monogram canvas. First used in the 1970s, the GG logo was an evolution of the original Gucci rhombi design from the 1930s, and from then it's been an established symbol of Gucci's heritage.

name: Silk dress with mirrors appliqu√©
description: The season's sleek silhouette draws inspirations from the 1990s, with slim-fitting tops and slightly low-slung bottoms. This black satin viscose silk dress reveals a sparkling micro mirrors appliqu√© that celebrates every movement.

name: Silk skirt with cut-out details

Revisited silhouettes and fresh pops of color blur the line between daytime and evening wear. name: Wool silk jacket

name: Lam√© polka dot silk cr√™pe skirt

name: Square optical frame
description: Gucci optical frames for Pre-Fall 2023 innovate classic styles with modern silhouettes and logo detailing. This pair of square frames is crafted from a metal construction. The matching temples are enriched with Gucci lettering detail.

name: GG canvas hairband

name: GG Marmont mini bag

name: Gucci Diana small tote bag
description: Speaking to the narrative of evolution and reinvention that runs through Gucci‚Äôs designs, the Gucci Diana reimagines a bamboo tote from the '90s archives. Crafted in soft white leather, this structured silhouette reveals two leather handles that can be folded into the interior, allowing versatility in styling it as a shoulder bag or top handle.

name: Gucci Diana small tote bag
description: Speaking to the narrative of evolution and reinvention that runs through Gucci‚Äôs designs, the Gucci Diana reimagines a bamboo tote from the '90s archives. Crafted in soft black leather, this spacious silhouette reveals two leather handles that can be folded into the interior, allowing versatility in styling it as a shoulder bag or top handle.

name: Gucci Diana medium tote bag
description: Speaking to the narrative of evolution and reinvention that runs through Gucci‚Äôs designs, the Gucci Diana reimagines a bamboo tote from the '90s archives. Crafted in soft green leather, this spacious silhouette reveals two leather handles that can be folded into the interior, allowing versatility in styling it as a shoulder bag or top handle.

name: Retro tweed jacket
description: The Spring Summer 2023 defines a new idea of preppy through tweed. The classic fabric, one of the brand‚Äôs most distinctive elements, completes a series of looks in this collection. This collarless jacket is presented in dark blue.

description: The Pre-Fall 2023 collection explores refined textures such as smooth velvet, sparkling crystal embroidery and diaphanous pleats. This eye-catching pant is presented in pink crystal GG stretch nylon tulle and comes complete with a detachable lining, offering increased styling options.

name: Retro tweed mini dress with Interlocking G
description: Deeply rooted in Gucci's heritage, a fascination for the past continues to permeate the House's collections. Inspired by vintage designs, the Spring Summer 2023 defines a new idea of elegance through tweed. The classic fabric, one of the brand‚Äôs most distinctive elements, is developed on collarless jackets with a modern feel, completing a series of looks in this collection. Here it creates a textural base for a classic mini dress, further defined with white ribbon trim and an embroidered Interlocking G.

name: Raffia-effect wide-brimmed hat with bow

description: Representative of founder Guccio Gucci's initials, the GG monogram brings a touch of structure and heritage to this soft cotton jumper. The dropped shoulder creates a relaxed silhouette, making it an incredibly versatile layering piece.

description: Pre-Fall eveningwear spotlights refined textures such as smooth velvet, sparkling crystal embroidery, and pleat detailing. This elegant dress is crafted from pink crystal GG stretch nylon tulle, revealing a keyhole detail and a sophisticated GG hook closure.

name: Technical jersey pant with Web
description: A relaxed attitude speaks volume as casual pieces become indispensable. name: Gucci Diana small shoulder bag
description: Combining recognizable elements of the House, the Gucci Diana is defined by its bamboo handles and Double G hardware. Crafted from white leather, the accessory is further accentuated by a contrasting red leather shoulder strap.

name: Gucci Diana small shoulder bag
description: Combining recognizable elements of the House, the Gucci Diana is defined by its bamboo handles and Double G hardware. Crafted from pale green leather, the soft structure of this variation on the staple accessory is further accentuated by a pastel colorway and tonal trims.

name: Gucci Diana small shoulder bag
description: Combining recognizable elements of the House, the Gucci Diana is defined by its bamboo handles and Double G hardware. Crafted from brown leather, the accessory is further accentuated by a contrasting black leather shoulder strap.

description: From horses and medallions to the Gucci script, all-over prints on lightweight blouses, dresses, pajamas, and signature pieces emphasize visual contrast. This silk pair pf pants features an allover paisley print in purple and mint green.

name: GG cotton polo dress

name: Gucci Porter cabin plus trolley
description: Referencing the House's beginnings in the world of luggage and Guccio Gucci‚Äôs time at the Savoy Hotel in London, travel items continue to evolve to embrace the contemporary. This cabin trolley is presented in a unique combination of black aluminum and black GG Supreme canvas.

The variation in beige and ebony GG Supreme is part of the Gucci Savoy line, complete with a Double G hardware, it offers different sizes for efficient organization and packing.

name: Wool cr√™pe jacket

The House reinterprets classic silhouettes, combining minimal jackets with cues from the 1990s for an innovative update of the wardrobe. This wool cr√™pe jacket features a bold rectangular G buckle.

Subtle details such as the Horsebit continue to appear as decorative elements throughout the collections. Here, the iconic symbol highlights the smooth surface of this handbag, an evolution of the classic Gucci Horsebit 1995 shape.

description: Celebrating 70 years of the historic Horsebit, the hardware is revisited for the latest collection to include a sparkling crystal bezel. This small shoulder bag in pink leather is elevated to luxurious heights with elegant new elements such as the Horsebit with crystals.

name: Gucci Horsebit 1955 small shoulder bag
description: Celebrating 70 years of the historic Horsebit, the hardware is revisited for the latest collection to include a sparkling crystal bezel. This small shoulder bag in black leather is elevated to luxurious heights with elegant new elements such as the Horsebit with crystals.

name: Gucci Horsebit 1955 small shoulder bag
description: The Gucci Horsebit 1955 embodies the House's history. Recreated from an archival design, the shoulder bag's lines and forms have a heritage that goes back more than six decades. Here, presented in white leather, the style is elevated to luxurious heights with elegant new elements such as the Horsebit with crystals.

name: Gucci Horsebit 1955 small shoulder bag
description: The Gucci Horsebit 1955 embodies the House's history. Recreated from an archival design, the shoulder bag's lines and forms have a heritage that goes back more than six decades. Here, presented in black leather, the style is elevated to luxurious heights with elegant new elements such as the Horsebit with crystals.

description: Crafted from tortoiseshell acetate, this cat eye optical frame is characterized by a three-tone tortoiseshell, red and dark green acetate temples. The Interlocking G, a subtle nod to the Founder of the brand, Guccio Gucci, completes the style.

name: Cat eye optical frame
description: Crafted from black acetate, this cat eye optical frame is characterized by a two-tone black and pearled brown acetate. The Interlocking G, a subtle nod to the Founder of the brand, Guccio Gucci, completes the style.

name: GG large belt bag
description: In keeping with the timeless feel that permeates the latest luggage selection, this large belt bag appears in the classic beige and ebony GG Supreme. The canvas has come to the front of each collection decade after decade to become a hallmark of the House. An Interlocking G leather tag completes the design.

name: Denim shorts with floral embroidery
description: Crafted from blue denim, this pair of shorts is defined by a floral embroidery with crystals and sequins. Gucci explores new takes on the cult fabric, reinterpreting it with different designs and washing techniques that blur the line between vintage and contemporary.

name: Extra fine wool sweater
description: Gucci continues to explore a variety of possibilities, translating the concept onto fabrics and silhouettes to present new purposes and ways of dressing. This sweater is crafted from red extra fine wool and is enriched with a Horsebit intarsia with Gucci embroidery, a nod to the House's heritage.

name: Gucci Interlocking diamond necklace
description: The Gucci Interlocking jewelry collection takes a cue from the geometric logo, resulting in this design. Set with diamonds and embellished with Gucci Interlocking, the piece crafted in 18k yellow gold is ideal for every occasion.

name: Shiny lycra gloves
description: Accessories continue to speak to the Gucci narrative in unexpected ways. Crafted from shiny lycra, this pair of white gloves is defined with a driver gloves-inspired opening.

name: Letter Q keychain
description: Colorful leather keychains in the shape of letters echo the theme of self-expression seen throughout Gucci collections. The GG Supreme canvas completes the back, adding a subtle logo touch. Here the letter 'Q' appears in cuir and purple leather.

name: GG mini packing cube
description: Gucci's latest travel selection takes its roots from 1900s; the heyday of luxury luggage. This mini packing cube is designed to compliment other Gucci luggage pieces and is crafted from the House's unmistable GG Supreme canvas in black. A black leather trim completes the design, while the zip closure allows for easy access.

name: Metal handbag with crystal bow
description: Capturing synchrony amongst elements previously unknown to each other, the Cruise 2023 Gucci Cosmogonie collection is filled with details from different decades, giving life to "eclectic thought". A collection of clutches speaks to this narrative with crystal encrusted bows and add a playful dimension to classic silhouettes.

name: Metal handbag with crystal bow

name: GG hat case
description: Part of Gucci's travel line, this hat case combines a vintage-inspired silhouette with archival House codes. The GG, a contemporary interpretation of the original 1930s design, continues to influence signature pieces. This black canvas case is complete with studded leather trim.

description: Gucci's latest travel selection takes its roots in the 1900s; the heyday of luxury luggage. Here the classic silhouette in medium is revisited through the Gucci lens, crafted from black GG Supreme canvas.

description: Inspired by vintage travel and referencing Guccio Gucci‚Äôs beginnings at the Savoy Hotel in London, Gucci latest range of luggage pieces includes this rigid trunk complete with five drawers. name: Gucci Savoy trunk
description: This item is part of the Gucci Savoy line, a selection of travel pieces that pay homage to Guccio Gucci‚Äôs beginnings as a porter at the London hotel. Gucci latest range of luggage pieces includes this rigid trunk complete with five drawers. Crafted from beige and blue GG Supreme canvas with the blue and red Web, the classic design pays homage to the House archives.

name: Ophidia GG small shoulder bag
description: The Ophidia is reinvented in new and unexpected ways. Reminiscent of the punk scene, metal eyelets and studs define the historical silhouette to create a one-of-a-kind take on the archival style. Creating a playful contrast, the small-sized shoulder bag is crafted from the House's signature GG Supreme canvas in the traditional color combination of beige and ebony.

name: Women's Rhyton sneaker
description: With its recognizable oversized sole and chunky construction, the Rhyton is introduced in black leather. In a message about leaving fashion‚Äôs old rules behind, Gucci conveys the idea that pieces should be timeless‚Äìnot just in fashion for one season. Speaking to this theme, signature House styles are reimagined in new ways.

name: GG Supreme Oxford cotton skirt
description: Essential pieces in the women's Cruise 2024 collection are embellished with signature Gucci motifs for the wardrobe. This pleated skirt has been crafted from GG Supreme Oxford cotton, offering a contemporary twist on a classic wardrobe staple.

name: Gucci Blondie medium top handle bag
description: Coming from the House's archives, the Interlocking G logo is reintroduced for this new collection. The gold-toned hardware adds a defined vintage touch, enriching the design with timelessness. The GG Supreme canvas top handle bag is completed by two interchangeable straps.

name: Wool mohair GG dress
description: The GG motif returns in new iterations ‚Äì including lam√© offerings, boucl√© intricate tweeds in refined materials and sequin embellishments. With a bold version of the emblematic monogram, this dress pairs the wool mohair fabric with fringe details.

name: Wool mohair GG dress
description: Gucci puts a twist on tweed by innovating the traditional textile with the House's Web design. The new collection's tweed blazers and skirts, which can be worn separately or as a suit, exude colorful style. Presented in black and ivory wool mohair, this striking dress is completed with the GG motif and fringed edges.

name: GG wool jacquard jacket
description: The Cruise 2024 collection features a wide range of pant suits in houndstooth and classic menswear patterns. Worn separately or as an ensemble, blazers, pants, and skirts form an essential part of the transitional season wardrobe. Presented in GG wool jacquard, this elegant jacket reveals a wide notch lapel and three pockets.

name: GG silk cr√™pe shirt
description: A subtle nod to the House‚Äôs heritage, the tonal check GG pattern enriches this silk shirt, designed with self-covered buttons and a narrow point collar for a retro inspired look. A hallmark era of the House, the ‚Äò70s continue to influence the Gucci narrative.

name: GG silk crepe shirt
description: A concept continuously explored by Gucci, tailor-inspired pieces combine sartorial excellence and an eclectic vision. This ivory GG silk cr√™pe shirt has a point collar and self-covered buttons.

name: Multi-use Palette De Beaut√© Quatuor, Wild Bouquet
description: Palette de Beaut√© Quatuor multiplies creative freedom with a four-part palette for eyes, lips, and cheeks. From soft to sophisticated and every look in between, intuitive formulas and inventive shades offer endless combinations. Comfortable to wear and long-lasting, three powder formulas in satin and matte finishes can be used as eyeshadow or blush. These colors are combined with a cream formula, ideated to warm up eyes, lips, and cheeks. Inspired by Gucci Beauty lipsticks, the allover cream shade brings a bare-to-bold blushing effect that intensifies with every touch.

name: GG cotton jacket
description: Sartorial excellence and an eclectic vision combine for an exclusive assortment of tailored pieces. Crafted from cotton faille, this double-breasted jacket is defined by a notch collar in contrast d shade.

name: GG wool boucl√© jacquard sweater
description: The GG motif returns in new iterations ‚Äì including lam√© offerings, boucl√© intricate tweeds in refined materials and sequin embellishments. Part of the selection, this sweater is crafted from GG wool boucl√© jacquard.

name: GG wool boucl√© jacquard dress
description: The GG motif returns in new iterations ‚Äì including lam√© offerings, boucl√© intricate tweeds in refined materials and sequin embellishments. Part of the selection, this dress is crafted from GG wool boucl√© jacquard.

name: GG wool boucl√© jacquard dress
description: The GG motif returns in new iterations ‚Äì including lam√© offerings, boucl√© intricate tweeds in refined materials and sequin embellishments. Part of the selection, this dress is crafted from GG wool boucl√© jacquard.

name: Jersey cropped top
description: This cropped top is crafted from black polyamide jersey, and it is defined by an Interlocking G detail on the front. Influences drawn from the sportswear and leisurewear worlds collide into an inherently Gucci style, combining emblematic Gucci symbols with the active world.

name: GG wool boucl√© jacquard skirt
description: The GG motif returns in new iterations, including lam√© offerings, boucl√© intricate tweeds in refined materials and sequin embellishments. Part of the selection, this skirt is crafted from GG wool boucl√© jacquard.

name: Denim pant with GG cuff
description: A cult fabric, denim continues to be rediscovered throughout each collection through an exploration of different silhouettes, finishes, and combinations. This pair of jeans interprets the spirit of experimentation by pairing a '70s-inspired cut with symbols from the House's heritage.

name: Specialized fit square optical frame
description: A historical House code, the Web pays homage to Gucci's equestrian roots. Repurposed each season, it appears here as part of the Gucci Love Parade collection, decorating the acetate tips. A subtle Interlocking G logo detail completes the gold-toned metal structure.

name: Square optical frame
description: Part of Gucci Love Parade, these optical frames are defined by a '70s square frame construction. Crafted entirely from dark tortoiseshell acetate, the name of the House appears in bold, gold-toned, lettering along the temples‚Äîcompleting the style with a distinct logo feel.

name: Round frame sunglasses
description: A cut-out Interlocking G detail defines the temples of these sunglasses, imbuing the style with an unmissable logo feel. The round frame construction, in dark tortoiseshell acetate, has a retro vibe in keeping with the joyful Hollywood theme that defined the latest collection.

name: Silk organza skirt
description: A classic pencil skirt style is reimagined, echoing the theme of seasonality seen in past collections. A proposal of daywear and formal wear is presented in new fabrics, patterns and fits, mix and matched with sensual and hyper-feminine silhouettes that take on a '70s influence. This skirt is shown in fine black silk organza with a delicate detachable lining.

name: Gucci Horsebit 1955 top handle bag
description: A unique copper lam√© leather lends a captivating evening feel to the latest range of Gucci handbags. This Gucci Horsebit top handle bag reveals the new shade alongside a tonal light copper-toned Double G hardware.

name: Gucci Diana mini ostrich tote bag
description: Combining recognizable elements of the House, the mini tote bag is defined by its bamboo handles and Double G hardware. Crafted from pastel pink ostrich leather, the accessory is further accentuated by two belt details, a playful reference to the bands used to keep handles in shape.

name: Gucci Diana mini tote bag
description: Combining recognizable elements of the House, the Gucci Diana is defined by its bamboo handles and Double G hardware. Crafted from blue leather, the mini-sized tote bag is further accentuated by two matching bands, a playful reference to the bands used to keep handles in shape.

name: Gucci Diana small tote bag
description: Combining recognizable elements of the House, the Gucci Diana is defined by its bamboo handles and Double G hardware. Crafted from blue leather, the small-sized tote bag is further accentuated by two matching bands, a playful reference to the bands used to keep handles in shape.

name: Gucci Diana small tote bag
description: The concept of reinvention continues to shape the House's designs. An evolution of a bamboo handle tote first introduced in 1991, the Gucci Diana represents the notion of style in constant evolution. The design plays with traditional details and renews them new meaning. Playing with this idea, the functional bands used to keep bamboo handles in shape are reimagined as playful leather belts. Here, the tote is introduced in off white GG perforated leather.

name: Gucci Diana small tote bag
description: The concept of reinvention continues to shape the House's designs. An evolution of a bamboo handle tote first introduced in 1991, the Gucci Diana represents the notion of style in constant evolution. The design plays with traditional details and renews them new meaning. Playing with this idea, the functional bands used to keep bamboo handles in shape are reimagined as playful leather belts. Here, the tote is introduced in light brown GG perforated leather.

name: Gucci Diana small tote bag
description: The concept of reinvention continues to shape the House's designs. An evolution of a bamboo handle tote first introduced in 1991, the Gucci Diana represents the notion of style in constant evolution. The design plays with traditional details and renews them new meaning. Playing with this idea, the functional bands used to keep bamboo handles in shape are reimagined as playful leather belts. Here, the tote is introduced in black GG perforated leather.

name: Gucci Diana small tote bag
description: Pastel colors add a soft touch to the Gucci Diana's well-structured design, while creating contrast with the bamboo handle and Web strap. The name of the House features as an embossed detail across the front, reinforcing the logo detail with an elegant finish.

name: GG Marmont mini top handle bag
description: Reflecting its origins, the GG Marmont is presented with a softly structured shape in black matelass√© leather. The Gucci Love Parade collection is a celebration of both archival codes and new designs. Playing with this concept, the accessory is introduced with monochrome hardware and a top handle.

name: Gucci Interlocking hoop earrings
description: The gourmette chain has been reprised from Gucci Aria, appearing not only in the form of necklaces and bracelets but also for smaller accessories. Here, the chain forms this pair of hoop earrings, complete with the emblematic Interlocking G logo.

name: GG Matelass√© small bag
description: Blending pink and beige, neutrals set the tone across a selection of handbags and accessories, putting the emphasis on textures, materials, and functionality. Here, it enriches this small bag and is further enhanced with a gold-toned Double G emblem.

name: Women's GG sneaker
description: This sneaker's chunky silhouette gives it a playful, retro feel. Gucci's collections continue to look to other eras, finding inspiration in the everyday and bringing them to the present. Crafted from white and grey GG Supreme canvas, the monogram motif adds a logo twist.

name: Gucci Horsebit 1955 jumbo GG mini bag
description: A part of the Gucci Horsebit 1955 universe, this bag's mini shape draws attention to the line's signature hardware. As a reimagination of Guccio Gucci's initials, the GG logo appears in a maxi size across the camel and ebony canvas.

name: Gucci Blondie wide belt
description: The Gucci Love Parade unfolded along the iconic Hollywood Boulevard. Self-expression defined the collection, a reflection of Los Angeles itself and its embrace of the idea that there are no rules when it comes to dressing up. Playing with this theme, the accessories and pieces of ready-to-wear continue to reimagine and reintroduce heritage details. With a wide silhouette, this black leather belt is distinguished by an archival iteration of the House's monogram hardware.

name: Extra fine rib viscose polo shirt
description: Essential pieces in the Pre-Fall 2023 collection are embellished with signature Gucci motifs for the wardrobe. This sleek polo top is presented in an extra fine viscose fabric and embellished with Double G gold-toned buttons.

name: Ophidia GG mini shoulder bag
description: Colors tell a story throughout Gucci Love Parade. One of the House's most emblematic materials, the GG Supreme is inspired by an archival design from the '30s. Traditionally presented in beige and ebony, the canvas is presented in a beige and white combination as an ode to timeless pieces and everlasting design. Here, the pattern defines this mini shoulder bag from the Ophidia line.

name: Ophidia GG mini shoulder bag
description: Colors tell a story throughout Gucci Love Parade. One of the House's most emblematic materials, the GG Supreme is inspired by an archival design from the '30s. Traditionally presented in beige and ebony, the canvas is presented in a beige and white combination as an ode to timeless pieces and everlasting design. Here, the pattern defines the Ophidia shoulder bag.

name: GG stretch jersey swimsuit
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Emblematic codes of the House and refined patterns are reinterpreted in contemporary ways for the Pre-Fall collection. This GG stretch jersey swimsuit is enriched with a striking cut-out detail.

name: Cotton poplin skirt with Web
description: Essential silhouettes with a timeless feel continue to unfold in throughout the latest collections. Emblematic House's codes taken from both the past and present history of Gucci enrich designs as a symbol of fashion that doesn't follow trends or seasons.

name: Women's Interlocking G cut-out sandal
description: Historic symbols continue to be reimagined and reinterpreted in new ways for the latest collections. Influenced by an archival design from the 1970s, the Interlocking G appears as a cut-out detail atop this sandal.

name: Gucci Savoy small cabin trolley
description: Mirroring the material's historic origins, GG Supreme is introduced in a timeless mix of blue and beige for Gucci Love Parade. The canvas has come to the front of each collection decade after decade to become a hallmark of the House. Here, the classic palette defines this Gucci Savoy carry-on trolley.

name: Round optical frame
description: The recognizable Double G emblem was originally inspired by a belt buckle from the 1970s and continues to enrich the narrative of Gucci today. Here it appears as a subtle detail along the temples of these round optical frames.The gold-toned metal construction is reminiscent of vintage styles, complete with contrasting acetate tips.

name: Specialized fit square optical frame
description: These square-shaped optical frames are characterized by a gold-toned metal frame and chain detail, reflecting the accessory's vintage inspiration. The Interlocking G logo, continues to be a distinguishing feature of Gucci's collections. Here it appears as a cut-out detail on the side of the metal temples, complete with acetate tips.

name: Pleated skirt with striped trim
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Tops and bottoms from jersey to denim and other materials open up numerous styling possibilities. This pleated skirt appears in a fine stretch viscose, allowing for easy movement and wear. A contrasting stripe trim and Gucci embroidery completes the design with a refined nod to the House.

name: GG stretch jersey bikini
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Emblematic codes of the House and refined patterns are reinterpreted in contemporary ways for the Pre-Fall collection. Here, the Interlocking G is paired with a sparkling G jersey monogram, mixing two historic motifs across a contemporary style.

description: With its unique features such as the hand-curved bamboo handle, Gucci Bamboo 1947 embodies the House‚Äôs signature style and artisanal excellence. Here it appears in a delicate pale yellow ostrich. Exclusively available via Client Advisors and in selected stores.

name: GG canvas and leather shorts
description: Classic pieces continue to be reimagined in creative ways through emblematic House symbols. Here this black pair of shorts appear in GG canvas, an evergreen version of the Gucci monogram, while a leather trim adds a contemporary touch to the essential design.

name: Cashmere vest with chain detail
description: A soft camel cashmere vest enriched with a chain and leather detail. Classic knitwear plays an essential role in reshaping the House's streamline aesthetic, with traditional silhouettes enriched by contemporary elements.

name: Women's Screener GG sneaker
description: Influenced by classic trainers from the '70s, the Screener sneakers‚Äînamed for the defensive sports move‚Äîfeature the Web stripe on the side and the vintage Gucci logo. Purple leather details complete the style, adding depth to the style through contrasting colors.

name: Jackie 1961 crystal GG lizard mini bag
description: Reinterpretations of House emblems appear throughout the Gucci Aria, enriched with intricate details and precious materials. The collection revisits signature materials, shapes and patterns as a celebration of the brand's 100-year long history. Crafted black lizard leather, this mini crescent moon shaped bag is defined by mesh with GG crystals. A detachable chain strap further accentuates the style with multiple ways to wear.

name: Jackie 1961 crystal GG mini shoulder bag
description: Brought back to the forefront, the Jackie 1961's recognizable shape is presented in timeless camel and ebony GG canvas with crystals that add an eclectic feel. Enhanced by a second detachable strap, the archival style takes on a contemporary feel, providing new ways to wear‚Äîfrom top handle, shoulder to cross body.

name: Jackie 1961 sequin mini bag
description: Once again at the forefront, the Jackie 1961's recognizable shape is enhanced with an additional, detachable shoulder strap. Attached to the bag with a buckle closure, the second strap adds a contemporary feel to the archival style, providing new ways to wear‚Äîfrom top handle, to shoulder and cross body. The style is introduced in black silk satin with sequins for the latest collection.

description: With its unique features such as the hand-curved bamboo handle, closure and a mirror in its own leather holder, Gucci Bamboo 1947 embodies the House‚Äôs signature style and artisanal excellence. Exclusively available via Client Advisors and in selected stores.

name: Gucci Bamboo 1947 medium top handle bag
description: With its unique features such as the hand-curved bamboo handle, closure and a mirror in its own leather holder, Gucci Bamboo 1947 embodies the House‚Äôs signature style and artisanal excellence. Exclusively available via Client Advisors and in selected stores.

name: Gucci Bamboo 1947 medium bag
description: With its unique features such as the hand-curved bamboo handle, closure and a mirror in its own leather holder, Gucci Bamboo 1947 embodies the House‚Äôs signature style and artisanal excellence. Exclusively available via Client Advisors and in selected stores.

name: GG jacquard silk wool shawl
description: The House's heritage motifs shine through eye-catching new details. Here, this silk wool shawl features a GG jacquard motif, demonstrating Gucci's design inspirations from the equestrian world.

name: GG print with Horsebit silk shawl
description: The House's heritage motifs shine through eye-catching new prints. Here, this silk shawl features a GG print with laminated Horsebits, demonstrating Gucci's design inspirations from the equestrian world.

name: Check tweed jacket
description: An emblem of the House‚Äôs aesthetic is a familiarity with the past, reworking iconic elements from each decade into the present. For this sartorial-inspired check tweed jacket, a gold-toned button row adds a vintage touch.

name: GG Marmont reversible thin belt
description: This GG Marmont belt is crafted from the unmistakable GG Supreme canvas and gold-toned Double G hardware that recalls the initials of the House's founder. As part of the Fall Winter 2023 women's collection, the signature design features a reversible function allowing for multiple ways to wear. Here a beige leather appears on the other side.

name: GG Marmont card case wallet
description: This small wallet combines the House's Monogram canvas with metallic gold leather. The GG motif appears alongside another logo detail, the Double G. The petite archival symbol, in gold-toned hardware, compliments this accessory featuring several card slots and one bill compartments, secured with a snap closure.

name: Gucci Horsebit 1955 python mini bag
description: Petite versions of the Gucci Horsebit 1955 add a hybrid twist to the vintage inspired line. Enriched with two different shoulder straps, the mini bag‚Äôs character transforms from understated elegance with a tonal leather strap to a strong logo feel thanks to a red and green Web option. The accessory is presented in natural colored python with gold-toned hardware.

name: Wool hat with leather detail
description: Unexpected details redefine accessories in a celebration of uniqueness. This wool hat is defined by a leather belt.

name: Jackie 1961 small shoulder bag
description: The reintroduction of the Jackie bag for Fall Winter 2020 presents a new take on a historical Gucci icon. Brought back to the forefront, the recognizable shape is presented in GG Supreme canvas and enhanced with an additional, detachable shoulder strap. Attached to the bag with a buckle closure, the second strap adds a contemporary feel to the archival style, providing new ways to wear‚Äîfrom top handle, shoulder to cross body. Pieces with versatile ways to wear and style embrace each person who is part of the House‚Äôs individual spirit. The Jackie 1961: available exclusively in Gucci stores and on Gucci.com

name: Reversible GG mohair cardigan
description: The cardigan takes centre stage as an essential piece in the Cruise 2024 collection. With a long and relaxed silhouette, it complements a range of pieces from dresses to jeans. This reversible cardigan is crafted from a GG jacquard mohair blend, in a fresh expression of the House's iconic monogram.

name: Cashmere cardigan with Horsebit
description: Classic knitwear designs in sophisticated color schemes are enriched by refined details and emblematic House codes. Crafted from soft cashmere, this cardigan features the gold-toned metal Horsebit, a notable Gucci symbol borrowed from the equestrian world.

name: GG embroidered tulle lingerie set
description: Crafted from black embroidered GG tulle, this bra and briefs set completes several looks from the Pre-Fall 2020 collection. Diaphanous lingerie styles embody what the Creative Director describes as a "beautiful clich√© of sexiness," a concept explored throughout the latest collections with hints to the idea of freedom that fashion experienced in the '90s.

name: Women's GG platform slide sandal
description: Gucci's signature shoes for women spotlight a striking motif. The founder's initials form part of an allover jacquard design with a geometric GG pattern. These platform sandals appear in ivory and green canvas.

name: Gucci Horsebit 1955 zip around wallet
description: Introduced within the Gucci Horsebit 1955 accessories collection for Spring Summer 2020, the zip around wallet is presented in GG Supreme canvas with brown leather trim. The line is defined by the same double bar and ring design that is found within handbags‚Äîa detail that is part of Gucci's genetic code and established as one of the most distinctive elements among the House symbols borrowed from the equestrian world.

name: GG check tweed jacket
description: Reminiscent of a cardigan design, this tweed jacket has an open front and diagonal patch pockets. In a color combination that recalls the Sylvie Web, the blue, white and red check mixes with the GG pattern. Imbued with an inherent ladylike feel, tweed defines the House's collections, from traditional shapes to unexpected, contemporary designs.

name: Ophidia GG key case
description: The key case presented in GG Supreme canvas trimmed with the green and red Web stripe and Double G hardware‚Äîa classic combination of the House's most recognizable elements that defines the line. The world of Ophidia continues to evolve, incorporating new shapes and silhouettes for Cruise 2020.

name: GG Marmont medium wallet
description: This wallet combines the House's Monogram canvas with oatmeal leather. The GG motif appears alongside another logo detail, the Double G. The petite archival symbol, in gold-toned hardware, compliments this accessory featuring several card slots and one bill compartments, secured with a snap closure.

name: Ophidia GG Pouch
description: Reflecting the Creative Director's contemporary vision, the Ophidia lines come to life with a pop of fluorescent yellow. The toiletry case combines the signature Double G detail with the GG Supreme canvas in beige and ebony, a timeless pairing that speaks to Gucci's roots.

name: Ophidia GG shoulder bag
description: The shoulder bag has a small elongated shape with a zipper closure and front pocket. A classic combination of the House's most recognizable elements‚Äîthe GG motif and Web stripe‚Äîthe world of Ophidia continues to evolve, incorporating new shapes and silhouettes. Crafted in GG Supreme canvas, the collection is defined by the Double G hardware.

name: GG Marmont mini bucket bag
description: A mini bucket bag presented in white matelass√© leather with a heart detail on the back. The GG Marmont collection is defined by the emblematic Double G hardware‚Äîa contemporary take on a Gucci archival belt buckle from the '70s that has become a hallmark of the House. Completed by a gold-toned chain strap, the dynamic shape can be worn in multiple ways.

name: GG Marmont mini bucket bag
description: The world of GG Marmont expands with the introduction of a mini bucket bag shape in black matelass√© leather with a chevron motif. Inspired by an archival design from the '70s‚Äîa hallmark era of the House‚Äîthe Double G decorates the front of this accessory. Featuring a chain strap and drawstring closure the versatile shape can also be worn as a cross body bag.

name: Women's Screener leather sneaker
description: Influenced by classic trainers from the '70s, the Screener sneakers‚Äînamed for the defensive sports move‚Äîfeature the Web stripe on the side and vintage Gucci logo, treated for an allover distressed effect. A pastiche of different influences that span across decades, the Pre-Fall 2019 collection continues to reference old school shapes and materials inspired by vintage sportswear.

name: Women's Screener leather sneaker
description: Influenced by classic trainers from the '70s, the Screener sneakers‚Äînamed for the defensive sports move‚Äîfeature the Web stripe on the side and vintage Gucci logo, treated for an allover distressed effect. A pastiche of different influences that span across decades, the Pre-Fall 2019 collection continues to reference old school shapes and materials inspired by vintage sportswear.

name: GG jacquard shawl
description: An evolution of the original Gucci rhombi design, the GG logo has become an established symbol of Gucci's heritage. Integrated within the Cruise 2019 collection, the distinctive pattern is reimagined in combination with a multicolored pastel pattern.

name: GG jacquard shawl
description: A shawl crafted using a jacquard technique and featuring the GG pattern. An evolution of the original Gucci rhombi design, the logo has become an established symbol of Gucci's heritage. Here it is reimagined in a combination of multicolor tones.

name: Women's Princetown slipper
description: Since its debut, the Princetown slipper has become a mainstay of Gucci collections. Unconventional yet entirely modern, the influential accessory is a contemporary interpretation of the Horsebit loafer, envisioned for the latest collection in burgundy suede.

name: Women's Princetown slipper
description: Since its debut, the Princetown slipper has become a mainstay of Gucci collections. Unconventional yet entirely modern, the influential accessory is a contemporary interpretation of the Horsebit loafer, envisioned for the latest collection in light brown suede.

name: Modal silk shawl with GG bees motif
description: An unexpected combination of two historic Gucci codes, the modal silk shawl presents the original GG pattern printed with gold bees. An archival symbol first introduced in Gucci ready-to-wear in the 1970s, the bee is reintroduced as a symbol of the House.

name: Ophidia GG mini bucket bag
description: The world of Ophidia evolves with the introduction of a mini bucket bag shape. Crafted in GG Supreme canvas with inlaid green and red Web stripe along the bottom, the accessory is completed with an adjustable shoulder strap.

name: Ophidia GG mini round shoulder bag
description: The world of Ophidia evolves with the introduction of a round mini bag with a chain shoulder strap. Crafted in GG Supreme canvas with inlaid green and red Web stripe, the accessory is enhanced by a petite play on the Double G, an archival Gucci code from the '70s that appears atop a leather tab detail and on the zipper pull.

name: Women's Ace GG Supreme sneaker with bees
description: Since its debut, the Ace sneaker has become a mainstay of the House's collections. The retro-looking design is inspired by a Gucci sneaker from the 1970s, with the Web stripe along the sides. A metallic gold bees print embellishes the low-top silhouette.

name: The Alchemist's Garden, The Voice of the Snake, 100ml, eau de parfum
description: Gucci's first Haute Perfumery line, The Alchemist's Garden unfolds within an imagined laboratory filled with curious jars and mesmerizing scents. The customizable collection made up of eaux de parfum, perfumed oils and acque profumate ("scented waters") is inspired by the art of alchemy and fragrance-making, formulated to be layered and blended together to create a unique, personalized fragrance combination. Built around a hero ingredient linked to the distinctive codes of the House, each scent can be magnified, muted or fused with other fragrances from the luxury collection to create a one-of-a-kind sillage.

name: Ophidia GG small tote bag
description: The world of Ophidia evolves with the introduction of a small top handle tote with a detachable shoulder strap. Crafted in GG Supreme canvas with inlaid green and red Web stripe, the accessory is enhanced by a petite play on the Double G, an archival Gucci code from the '70s that appears atop a leather tab detail and on the zipper pull.

name: GG Marmont mini top handle bag
description: The mini GG Marmont top handle bag has a softly structured shape and an oversized flap closure with Double G hardware. Equipped with a leather top handle and chain shoulder strap, made in matelassé chevron leather with a heart on the back.

name: GG Marmont mini top handle bag
description: A new introduction to the GG Marmont line for Cruise 2019, the mini GG Marmont top handle bag has a softly structured shape and an oversized flap closure with Double G hardware. Equipped with a leather top handle and chain shoulder strap, made in matelass√© chevron leather with a heart on the back.

name: GG Marmont chain wallet
description: A slim wallet crafted from a mix of the House's monogram canvas and smooth black leather and completed by a delicate chain strap. A part of the GG Marmont line, the style is defined by a mini version of the emblematic Double G hardware.

name: Oversize rectangular sunglasses
description: Crafted from acetate, these rectangular sunglasses are characterized by a shiny black front and a crystal Gucci logo detail on the temples. Each season, House codes and symbols are reimagined and reintroduced in creative new ways.

name: GG cotton lam√© cardigan
description: Gucci continues to explore incorporating original design elements into new collections. The emblematic monogram motif from the 1970s is reinterpreted in gold lam√© contrasted by a dark blue.

name: Ophidia GG french flap wallet
description: First used in the 1970s, the GG logo was an evolution of the original Gucci rhombi design from the 1930s, and from then it's been an established symbol of Gucci's heritage. The french flap wallet combines the signature motif with the Web stripe‚Äîa timeless pairing that pays homage to Gucci's roots.

name: Ophidia GG card case wallet
description: Highlighting the GG motif, one of the House's most defining codes, the world of Ophidia continues to evolve, incorporating new materials each season. This card case wallet features light beige GG denim, with leather trim and Double G hardware.

name: GG Marmont super mini bag
description: Crafted from ligt grey matelass√© chevron leather, this super mini bag is defined by the emblematic Double G logo in antique gold-toned hardware. A key ring that can be used to attach the accessory to a separate bag completes the style.

name: GG Marmont small shoulder bag
description: Looks from the Cruise 2024 Apr√©s Ski selection combine functionality with a stylish touch. Padded leather, fleece, and other fabrics are updated with new logo details. Here, the House's signature handbags present sumptuous materials like this off white shearling with the distinctive chevron pattern that blends traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design.

name: GG Marmont small shoulder bag
description: Looks from the Cruise 2024 Apr√©s Ski selection combine functionality with a stylish touch. Padded leather, fleece, and other fabrics are updated with new logo details. Here, the House's signature handbags present sumptuous materials like this shearling with the distinctive chevron pattern that blends traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design.

name: Gucci Jordaan loafer
description: The Gucci Jordaan loafer is an emblematic silhouette that spans across seasons. The classic shape is updated for the latest Gucci collection in a distinctive Gucci Rosso Ancora red GG canvas.

name: Wool hat with Web
description: A striped wool hat in a rib construction with our Web detail. A recurring accessory in the House's collections, the Gucci beanie complements looks with different attitudes, for an eclectic mix of styles and genres.

name: Women's Princetown leather slipper
description: The Princetown slippers are crafted in soft, shiny leather and finished with Gucci's signature Horsebit. The most recognizable Gucci lines are once again updated in seasonal colors.

name: Padlock small GG shoulder bag
description: A small structured GG Supreme canvas bag with a leather top and our key lock closure. The sliding chain strap can be worn multiple ways, changing between a shoulder and a top handle bag.

name: GG Marmont thin belt
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. The House's most emblematic motifs are portrayed as timeless yet ever-evolving symbols throughout the latest collection. Crafted from brown leather, this belt is defined by a light gold-toned Double G hardware.

name: GG Marmont wide belt
description: Each season, the House logo evolves in new creative ways. Here, the signature GG motif decorates this belt in, topped with Double G hardware.

name: Card case with GG Shadow
description: For the latest collections, the GG motif continues to be revisited with a contemporary twist. Presented in brown, this card case features the signature monogram with an optical effect to create a sense of dimension. Various card slots and compartments complete the inside organization.

name: Card case with GG Shadow
description: For the latest collections, the GG motif continues to be revisited with a contemporary twist. Presented in brown, this card case features the signature monogram with an optical effect to create a sense of dimension. Various card slots and an open compartment complete the accessory.

name: Gucci B small crossbody bag
description: Introduced for the men's Fall Winter 2024 collection, the Gucci B bag draws its name from an archive design, re-envisioned here with a relaxed silhouette that drapes across the body.The refined leather has a soft grainy touch and presents this version in Gucci Rosso Ancora red. The shoulder strap is adjustable and detachable, with an additional D-ring for attaching items.

name: Gucci B small crossbody bag
description: Introduced for the men's Fall Winter 2024 collection, the Gucci B bag draws its name from an archive design, re-envisioned here with a relaxed silhouette that drapes across the body. The refined leather has a soft grainy touch and presents this version in black. The shoulder strap is adjustable and detachable, with an additional D-ring for attaching items.

name: Card case with AirTag
description: The latest small leather accessories line for men explores new functionalities and colorways. Crafted from a dark grey matte grainy leather, this functional AirTag holder works both as a keychain and card case. The snap hook detail allows the accessory to be matched with larger travel bags.

The snap hook detail allows the accessory to be matched with larger travel bags.

description: The latest small accessories line for men explores new functionalities and colorways. name: Polyester GG jacquard pant with Web
description: The GG motif appears in unexpected colors and fabric combinations, from linen blend to nylon. Crafted from a polyester GG jacquard, this pair of pants is defined by a blue and red Web and a Gucci embroidery along the leg split.

name: Gucci flora and fauna print silk shorts
description: Emblematic codes of the House and refined patterns are reinterpreted in contemporary ways for the Pre-Fall collection. These regular fit shorts are made from a grey silk twill and feature an allover Gucci floral and fauna print for a fresh twist.

name: GG Horsebit print silk twill short
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. These regular fit shorts are made from a camel and ebony silk twill and feature an allover GG Horsebit print illuminated in the House colors green and red.

name: Sequin viscose polo top
description: Creative Director Sabato De Sarno reinvents the essential men's wardrobe for the Fall Winter 2024 collection, with wearabilty and fit becoming key statements. Knitwear pieces are updated with modern silhouettes in luxurious fabrics. Here, an allover sequin embroidery enriches this viscose polo top.

name: Men's chunky sneaker
description: This sneaker's chunky silhouette gives it a playful, retro feel. Gucci's collections continue to look to other eras. This pair of sneakers is crafted in white Demetra, a material created with the same processes used for tanning, the new material offers pliable and resilient performance with a supple finish. A Gucci Web print completes the style.

name: Men's loafer with Web
description: The latest collection explores the archives, adding contemporary touches to vintage styles as a tribute to both the brand's past, present and future. This pair of leather loafers is defined by the iconic green and red Web.

name: Cotton jersey T-shirt with embroidery
description: Part of the men's Fall Winter 2024 collection, everyday ready-to-wear pieces are elevated thanks to high quality materials and impeccable craftsmanship. This oversize fit T-shirt appears in a white heavy felted cotton jersey, while a Gucci embroidery enriches the chest.

name: Cotton jersey T-shirt with embroidery
description: Part of the men's Fall Winter 2024 collection, everyday ready-to-wear pieces are elevated thanks to high quality materials and impeccable craftsmanship. This heavy cotton jersey T-shirt features an embossed Gucci University crest, a new motif from Creative Director Sabato De Sarno.

name: Technical wool coat
description: Creative Director Sabato De Sarno reinvents the essential men's wardrobe for the Fall Winter 2024 collection, with wearabilty and fit becoming key statements. Drawing from different English subcultures, coats in technical wool are a staple piece with unexpected and exaggerated silhouettes. This burgundy style features a subtle inside pocket.

name: Cotton knit vest with Web
description: From the 1970s 'Gucci Tennis' sneaker to the present day, the House continues to express its connection to the sport with signature pieces focusing on heritage as well as innovation. This V-neck vest is presented in a cotton piquet knit and enriched with a Gucci embroidery and a rib Web trim.

name: Horsebit silk jacquard tie
description: Soft and silk accessories appeared on the men's Fall Winter 2024 runway accompanied by leather pieces to create statement looks. Here, a 3D effect Horsebit motif defines this dark blue silk tie as an intricate jacquard detail.

name: Horsebit silk jacquard tie
description: Soft and silk accessories appeared on the men's Fall Winter 2024 runway accompanied by leather pieces to create statement looks. Here, a 3D effect Horsebit motif defines this navy and red silk tie as an intricate jacquard detail.

name: Cotton jersey T-shirt
description: Transitioning into the warm season, new sets bring to mind a sartorial uniform enriched with subtle yet refined details, in cotton or jersey, in logo-detailed outerwear or knitwear. This regular fit T-shirt is crafted from cotton jersey and features a Gucci 1921 handwritten print at the front.

name: Trademark chain necklace with padlock
description: The Gucci Trademark line combines motifs and hexagonal bolt charms with the name of the House. From the cut-out heart to the padlock pendant, playful symbols continue to distinguish a selection of rings, necklaces, bracelets and earrings for Pre-Fall 2024. A Gucci Trademark engraved padlock defines this sterling silver chain necklace.

name: Belt with rectangular buckle
description: Versatile and essential pieces continue to enrich the Gucci Pre-Fall 2024 collection. Presented in dark brown leather, this belt features a rectangular silver-toned buckle with an engraved Gucci logo to bring definition to everyday styling.

name: Belt with rectangular buckle
description: Versatile and essential pieces continue to enrich the Gucci Pre-Fall 2024 collection. Presented in black leather, this belt features a rectangular silver-toned buckle with an engraved Gucci logo to bring definition to everyday styling.

name: Cotton polo shirt with Web
description: The Web is being reenvisioned as patterns and unique details through complex constructions and stitching techniques that elevate knitwear and more pieces from mere sportswear to iconic masterpieces. This regular fit polo shirt is made from a fine wool and features a green and red Web intarsia on the reverse.

name: Men's Gucci Ace sneaker with Web
description: Since its debut, the Ace sneaker has become a mainstay of the House's narrative. A new version of the characteristic low-top silhouette is presented in the latest collection, featuring unique details.

name: Ophidia super mini bag
description: A selection of bags, including mini cross-body bags, briefcases and totes have been reshaped with functional details. Crafted from grey and black GG Supreme canvas, this Ophidia super mini bag comes with a detachable shoulder strap.

name: Ophidia super mini shoulder bag
description: A selection of bags, including mini cross-body bags, briefcases and totes have been reshaped with functional details. Crafted from grey and black GG Supreme canvas, this super mini bag features a zip pocket and an adjustable shoulder strap.

name: GG medium duffle bag
description: Historical materials continue to be brought back into the forefront of Gucci creativities. For the Pre-Fall 2024 collection, the GG Supreme is paired with leather atop a selection of small accessories and bags, presenting archival details in a contemporary way. Here, this duffle bag is presented in black GG Supreme canvas.

name: Keychain with Gucci logo
description: Reflecting the Creative Director's contemporary vision, the Gucci logo continues to enrich the small accessories' selection. This keychain spotlights black leather with the iconic Gucci script.

name: Shorts with Web intarsia
description: From the 1970s 'Gucci Tennis' sneaker to the present day, the House continues to express its connection to the sport with signature pieces focusing on heritage as well as innovation. This regular fit short is presented in a nylon and cotton piquet and defined by a debossed Gucci detail and a green and red Web intarsia.

name: GG card case with GG detail
description: For the men's Fall Winter collection, signature small accessories are reintroduced in new colorways and combinations. Crafted from beige and ebony GG Supreme canvas, this card case is enriched with brass hardware with a ceramic-effect finishing. The accessory features several card slots on the inside.

name: GG card case with GG detail
description: For the men's Fall Winter collection, signature small accessories are reintroduced in new colorways and combinations. Crafted from beige and ebony GG Supreme canvas, this card case is enriched with brass hardware with a ceramic-effect finishing. The accessory features several card slots on the inside.

name: GG card case with GG detail
description: Slim and compact small leather goods from the latest collections highlight new colorful shades sporting the GG logo with a bicolor design. This card case with six slots appears in a black GG Supreme canvas, complete with a smooth bordeaux leather trim.

name: GG passport case with GG detail
description: For the men's Fall Winter collection, signature small accessories are reintroduced in new colorways and combinations. Crafted from beige and ebony GG Supreme canvas, this passport case is enriched with brass hardware with a ceramic-effect finishing.

name: GG super mini bag
description: Part of the Pre-Fall selection, crossbody bags are ideal for everyday looks. Revitalizing functional pieces with a modern-day interpretation, everyday accessories are defined by the emblematic monogram. Crafted from beige and ebony Original GG canvas and leather, this super mini bag features an open pocket and an adjustable shoulder strap.

name: GG super mini bag
description: Part of the Pre-Fall selection, crossbody bags are ideal for everyday looks. Revitalizing functional pieces with a modern-day interpretation, everyday accessories are defined by the emblematic monogram. Crafted from beige and blue Original GG canvas and leather, this super mini bag features an open pocket and an adjustable shoulder strap.

name: GG Marmont long wallet
description: The signature Double G hardware is reimagined season after season, successfully demonstrating Gucci's way of connecting archival symbols to a modern aesthetic. The hardware is presented in a gold tone as part of Pre-Fall 2024, resulting in small leather accessories for a contemporary wardrobe. This long wallet is presented in black leather with multiple card slots and pockets.

name: Men's Horsebit loafer
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Since its debut, the slipper has become a mainstay of Gucci collections. Here it defines this pair of men's loafer crafted in Original GG canvas in a classic beige and ebony color.

name: Men's Horsebit loafer
description: Defined by an elegant silhouette, this man's loafer is crafted in refined leather and is completed by the iconic Horsebit with a silver finish.

name: Medium buckle briefcase with Gucci logo
description: Slim and compact small leather goods from the latest collections highlight signature shades sporting the Gucci logo. This buckle briefcase with a three inside compartments is crafted in black leather, complete with the silver-toned logo detail.

name: Gucci flora and fauna print silk shirt
description: Emblematic codes of the House and refined patterns are reinterpreted in contemporary ways for the Pre-Fall collection. This shirt is made from a grey silk twill and feature an allover Gucci floral and fauna print for a fresh twist.

name: GG Horsebit print silk twill shirt
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. This regular fit shirt is presented in camel and ebony silk twill with an allover GG Horsebit print in the House colors, paying homage to the House's equestrian heritage.

name: GG canvas shirt

name: GG crossbody bag

A brown leather trim completes this cross-body bag, complete with one zip pocket and flat pocket.

name: GG crossbody bag
description: A selection of men's bags, including cross-body bags, briefcases and totes have been reshaped with functional details. Featuring a light construction in a beige and blue color palette, the GG motif defines each style made from the signature Original GG canvas. A dark blue leather trim completes this cross-body bag, complete with one zip pocket and flat pocket.

name: Rib cotton sweater with embroidery
description: Creative Director Sabato De Sarno reinvents the essential men's wardrobe for the Fall Winter 2024 collection, with wearabilty and fit becoming key statements. Knitwear pieces are updated with modern silhouettes in luxurious fabrics. Here, a hand-embroidered crystal collar enriches this navy rib cotton sweater.

name: Viscose jersey hooded sweatshirt
description: Part of the men's Fall Winter 2024 collection, everyday ready-to-wear pieces are elevated thanks to high quality materials and impeccable craftsmanship. A viscose jersey hooded sweatshirt is enriched with a Gucci embroidery.

name: Men's Horsebit loafer

description: In each collection, the Gucci logo continues to evolve in new ways. This grey felted cotton-jersey sweatshirt has a new interpretation of the logo called Gucci chain print.

name: Felt wool peacoat
description: A series of looks from the Cruise 2023 Gucci Cosmogonie runway is composed of unexpected darkness. The deepest hues are animated by subtle details and contrasting colors. This felt wool peacoat has a jester hat with Interlocking G patch.

name: GG canvas jacket
description: Crafted from GG canvas, this jacket is accented by contrast details. Introduced in the '70s as an evolution of the historic Gucci rhombi design, the monogrammed pattern is a distinctive code of the House.

name: Rectangular optical frame
description: Defined by a frameless construction, these rectangular optical frames recall the lightweight, alternative styles of the '90s and early 2000s. The contrasting pearled burgundy acetate temples are enriched by the Web enamel and an Interlocking G detail‚Äîhistorical House codes that imbue the style with heritage influences.

name: Rectangular optical frame
description: Defined by a frameless construction, these rectangular optical frames recall the lightweight, alternative styles of the '90s and early 2000s. The contrasting black acetate temples are enriched by the Web enamel and an Interlocking G detail‚Äîhistorical House codes that imbue the style with a heritage influence.

name: Rectangular frame sunglasses
description: A bold, sturdy structure defines these narrow rectangular-frame sunglasses for a modern final design. The wide black acetate frames and temples are decorated with rivets and 'Gucci' along the temples.

name: GG jacquard jacket
description: Classic elements still permeate the House's aesthetic, blending seamlessly with the contemporary for an updated yet never-out-of-style wardrobe. This light matte nylon jacket has a GG jacquard upper portion and green and red Web trim.

description: In keeping with the timeless feel that permeates the luggage selection for Gucci Love Parade, this backpack appears in elegant black GG Supreme. The canvas has come to the front of each collection decade after decade to become a hallmark of the House. An Interlocking G leather tag completes the design.

name: Card case wallet with Interlocking G
description: The Interlocking G has remained one of the most symbolic codes of the House since its introduction. The distinguishing emblem appears as a leather detail atop this card case wallet. Completing the design's logo feel, the style is crafted from monogram canvas.

name: Cotton T-shirt with Double G
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. A recurring detail of this collection, the Double G label adds a subtle logo connotation to this V-neck T-shirt, crafted from black cotton. A message about leaving fashion‚Äôs old rules behind, Gucci continues to convey the idea that pieces should be timeless‚Äìnot just in fashion for one season.

name: Leather bomber jacket
description: Originnaly inspired by the equestrian world, season after season, the Web continues to appear in new forms each season. This beige leather jacket is presented with flap pockets and a front zip closure. Web details complete the design.

name: Ophidia GG small cabin trolley
description: The Gucci color palette is constantly evolving to include more refined hues. New colorways and combinations result in the reinvention of signature styles with a contemporary feel. Cut-out silver-toned metal temples, through which a chain or neck bow can be attached, complete the design with an unconventional twist.

description: This square-shape optical frame is characterized by a shiny dark tortoiseshell acetate front. Inspired by the equestrian world, the blue and red Web is paired with the name of the House adding a subtle logo twist to the temples.

name: Square optical frame
description: This square-shape optical frame is characterized by a shiny black acetate front. Inspired by the equestrian world, the green and red Web is paired with the name of the House adding a subtle logo twist to the temples.
