name: Maxi GG silk cotton polo
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Unexpected contrast adds a bit of Hollywood glamour to this cotton polor shirt with shiny overize metal buttons. Codes that have become synonymous with the House remain a source of inspiration for the Creative Director. Originally created in the 1930s as an homage to Founder Guccio Gucci, the distinctive GG motif defines this polo with a colorblock back.

name: Tapered denim pant
description: Taking cues from the archive, Gucci Love Parade is a culmination of symbols, silhouettes and prints defining the ready-to-wear and accessories' selection. These tapered denim pants have a Horsebit on each back pocket‚Äîone of the most recognizable symbols of the House.

name: Men's GG sneaker

description: This sneaker's chunky silhouette gives it a playful, retro feel. Gucci's collections continue to look to other eras, finding inspiration in the everyday and bringing them to the present. Crafted from white GG embossed leather, the monogram motif adds a logo twist.

name: Men's GG sneaker
description: This sneaker's chunky silhouette gives it a playful, retro feel. Gucci's collections continue to look to other eras, finding inspiration in the everyday and bringing them to the present. Crafted from white and grey GG Supreme canvas, the monogram motif adds a logo twist.

With a vintage inspired soft acetate coating, the metal temple tips add a subtle contrast.

This small messenger bag combines the signature motif with the Web stripe‚Äîa timeless pairing that pays homage to Gucci's roots.

This chain bracelet necklace features the toggle closure with Gucci engraving that doubles up also as a charm detail.

There are also rose or white gold bands and hoop earrings set with baguette and trilliant-cut diamonds, as well as other rings and more hoop earrings in faceted yellow gold, or a mix of white and rose gold.

description: The Gucci Interlocking jewelry collection takes a cue from the geometric logo, resulting in this design. Sparkling with Interlocking G details and set with diamonds, the 18k white gold bracelet is ideal for everyday wear.

The watch is presented with a blue multi-layer case and five-link aluminum bracelet while the design is completed by sapphire glass. The name, GUCCI 25H, is attributed to a particularly symbolic talisman.

name: Gucci Flora 18k solitaire ring
description: The original Flora print was conceived by Italian artist Vittorio Accornero and presented on a silk scarf for Princess Grace of Monaco in the '60s. It has since been presented with a new point-of-view by incorporating the femininity and appeal of the print into a jewellery collection. Crafted from white gold, the ring is defined by a diamond solitaire. A diamond incrusted floral inspired motif pays tribute the the origins of the line's name. The style is completed with the House's monogram as a subtle logo detail.

name: Gucci Flora 18k solitaire ring
description: The original Flora print was conceived by Italian artist Vittorio Accornero and presented on a silk scarf for Princess Grace of Monaco in the '60s. It has since been presented with a new point-of-view by incorporating the femininity and appeal of the print into a jewellery collection. This precious ring is presented in white gold with a floral inspired motif. The style is elevated by sparkling white diamonds that decorate band and draw attention the solitaire cut diamond at the front.

name: Gucci Flora 18k solitaire ring
description: The original Flora print was conceived by Italian artist Vittorio Accornero and presented on a silk scarf for Princess Grace of Monaco in the '60s. description: First developed by Gucci in the 1950's, the Web continues to pay homage to the House's roots. The stripe motif adorns the strap giving the watch a sporty feel.

name: Gucci Blondie continental chain wallet
description: This Gucci Blondie continental chain wallet appears in white leather with a moir√© lining. The inside holds twelve card slots and two bill compartments, as well as a coin pocket. The round Interlocking G defines the front of the design, a geometric variation of the Gucci logo taken from the House archives.

name: Ophidia GG small shoulder bag
description: GG canvas, a recognizable design of the House, continues to adorn the signature handbag silhouettes. It is synonymous with Gucci's Ophidia line in particular, this season it is presented in black and grey as the color sheds new light on classic designs.

name: Ophidia GG small shoulder bag
description: Highlighting the GG motif, one of the House's most defining codes, the world of Ophidia continues to evolve, incorporating new materials each season. This small shoulder bag features light beige GG denim, with leather trim and Double G hardware.

name: Cotton polo with Interlocking G
description: The men's Cruise 2024 collection presents a contemporary silhouette. Voluminous trousers are paired with fitted jackets, while relaxed cargo pants worn with outerwear pieces offer a sporty edge. Presented in black heavy cotton jersey, this sleek polo shirt is defined by a green and red Web stripe and a retro GG embroidered patch.

name: Gucci Savoy medium duffle bag
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Reflecting the Creative Director's contemporary vision, the Ophidia lines come to life with a pop of fluorescent orange. Combining the GG motif and Web stripe with a modern hue launches signature travel pieces into the metropolis, such as this Gucci Savoy duffle bag.

name: Gucci stripe print silk neck bow
description: Neck bows were styled as necklaces for the men's Fall Winter 2024 fashion show, denoting a contemporary look with their exaggerated length. Mixing modern design with heritage details, the detachable leather and metal snap hook closure recalls the new Jackie Notte closure. A brown Gucci stripe print completes this black silk cr√™pe accessory.

name: Large GG tote bag
description: Signature pieces appear in the men's Fall Winter collection with a sporty attitude. Crafted from the Original GG canvas, timeless shapes and color palettes convey a contemporary mood through subtle details, such as the Web and embossed Gucci logo. This large tote bag, in Rosso Ancora red canvas, features multiple pockets and top handles.

name: Large GG duffle bag
description: Signature travel pieces appear in the men's Fall Winter collection with a sporty attitude. Crafted from the Original GG canvas, timeless accessories and color palettes convey a contemporary mood through subtle details, such as the Web and embossed Gucci logo. This large duffle bag, in beige and ebony canvas, features multiple pockets, top handle and D-ring.

name: Women's strappy ballet flat
description: This pair of strappy sandals is crafted in refined leather and defined by a knot detail on the side. The adjustable buckle closure completes the style.

name: Women's Horsebit pump with crystals
description: Gucci continues to feature archival symbols. For the latest collection, the Horsebit hardware recalls the House's equestrian heritage. This pair of women's pumps is crafted in patent leather and defined by a crystal encrusted heel.

name: Gucci Luce mini shoulder bag
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Gucci Luce, which translates to light in Italian, radiates playful charm and boundless joy. The new GG canvas defines this sophisticated mini shoulder bag. The light blue motif is accentuated by a tonal leather trim and light gold-toned hardware. The leather strap is adjustable, giving the bag additional function.

name: Crochet-effect cotton dress with Web
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. This boxy dress is made from a pink crochet-effect cotton and defined by a blue and red Web detail. A detachable slip dress lining offers increased versatility when it comes to styling.

name: Light wool stretch mid-length skirt
description: Designed with a low waist and a mid-length, this skirt combines elegance with a hint of allure. Crafted from black light wool stretch, this piece has a side zip closure.

name: Pleated dress with Web trim
description: From the 1970s 'Gucci Tennis' sneaker to the present day, the House continues to express its connection to the sport with signature pieces focusing on heritage as well as innovation. This regular fit dress is made from a fine stretch viscose and enriched with a Web stripe trim and subtle Gucci embroidery.

name: GG canvas pant
description: Emblematic codes of the House and refined patterns are reinterpreted in contemporary ways for the Pre-Fall collection. These straight-leg tailored pants are presented in camel and ebony Original GG canvas, making for a striking seasonal addition to your wardrobe.

name: GG belt print cashmere silk shawl
description: Emblematic codes of the House and refined patterns are reinterpreted in contemporary ways for the Pre-Fall collection. A GG belt print defines this sophisticated ivory and black cashmere silk shawl.

name: G-Timeless watch, 29mm
description: The season's polished look extends to watches and jewelry, including the G-Timeless collection. The round watch spotlights a sleek dial finish with subtle expressions of the Interlocking G and the Gucci lettering. Designed with a pink mother of pearl dial, the accessory is further enriched with signature motifs of the House.

name: Cat-eye frame sunglasses
description: For Cruise 2024, the eyewear selection is defined by archival silhouettes reinterpreted with a contemporary touch. Here, a gold-toned cat-eye metal frame is decorated with a Double G cut-out detail on the temples. Pink Guccissima lens completes the accessory.

name: Rectangular-frame sunglases
description: Sleek rectangular frames puts a twist on any ensemble, and the sculpted silhouette of this black injection frame adds visual interest. A gold-toned metal Double G detail adorns the temples, complete with solid grey lens.

name: Ophidia GG super mini shoulder bag
description: The world of Ophidia continues to evolve, incorporating new shapes and materials each season. Guccio Gucci's everlasting monogram continues to enrich new designs with a logo feel. This super mini shoulder bag is presented in the historical beige and ebony GG Supreme canvas, complete with the Double G hardware.

name: Women's Interlocking G espadrille sandal
description: Materials, textures and patterns combine to create a warm-weather feel throughout the collection. This pair of espadrilles is presented in ivory Interlocking G canvas.

name: Women's Interlocking G espadrille sandal
description: Materials, textures and patterns combine to create a warm-weather feel throughout the collection. This pair of espadrilles is presented in camel Interlocking G canvas.

name: Women's Interlocking G espadrille
description: Crafted in ivory canvas set against a cord platform, these espadrilles explore the rich contrasts seen throughout the latest Gucci collection. Featuring the emblematic Interlocking G motif, the style is finished with a tonal ribbon.

name: Women's Interlocking G espadrille
description: Crafted in a light brown canvas set against a cord platform, these espadrilles explore the rich contrasts seen throughout the latest Gucci collection. Featuring the emblematic Interlocking G motif, the style is finished with a tonal ribbon.

name: Women's Horsebit mid-heel sandal
description: House details add a logo touch to this pair of sandals. Inspired by the origins of the brand, the emblematic Horsebit defines the shoe. Presented in an eye-catching metallic gold leather, this pair of sandals is completed by an ankle buckle closure.

name: GG rubber-effect large duffle bag
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Reflecting the Creative Director's contemporary vision, travel pieces come to life in a bright blue takeover. The fluorescent new GG rubber-effect leather defines a range of accessories fit for the modern metropolis. This duffle bag comes with two inside pockets and a canvas shoulder strap.

name: GG cuff denim pant
description: A cult fabric, denim continues to be rediscovered throughout each collection through an exploration of different silhouettes, finishes, and combinations. This pair of jeans interprets the spirit of experimentation by pairing a '70s-inspired cut with symbols from the House's heritage.

name: Fine rib wool turtleneck sweater
description: Classic knitwear plays an essential role in reshaping the House's streamline aesthetic, like this red fine rib wool turtleneck sweater. A message about leaving fashion‚Äôs old rules behind, Gucci's collections continue to convey the idea that pieces should be timeless‚Äìnot just in fashion for one season.

name: Ophidia small tote bag
description: Within Gucci, the world of Ophidia evolves with new iterations, combining vintage inspired details with emblematic House codes. Equipped with a detachable shoulder strap, this tote bag is characterized by the inlaid green and red Web stripe and white leather trim. A petite Double G enriches the style, an archival Gucci code from the '70s that appears atop a leather tab detail and on the zipper pull.

name: GG Marmont mini top handle bag
description: The GG Marmont mini top handle bag has a softly structured shape and an oversized flap closure with Double G hardware. Equipped with a leather top handle and chain shoulder strap, this piece is crafted in light grey matelass√© leather highlighting curved lines.

name: Bucket hat with GG Shadow
description: Soft and silk accessories appeared on the men's Fall Winter 2024 runway accompanied by leather pieces to create statement looks. Here, the GG motif with a contemporary optical effect defines this grey and black canvas bucket hat.

name: Knit wool long sleeve polo top
description: Part of the men's Fall Winter 2024 collection, everyday ready-to-wear pieces are elevated thanks to high quality materials and impeccable craftsmanship. Contrasting white piping lends an elegant touch to this long sleeve polo top in rib kit wool. A Gucci intarsia completes the front chest pocket with a logo feel.

name: Super mini shoulder bag with GG Shadow
description: For the latest collections, the GG motif continues to be revisited with a contemporary twist. Presented in the Rosso Ancora red, this shoulder bag features the signature monogram with an optical effect to create a sense of dimension. An inside card slot and detachable shoulder strap completes the design.

name: Trademark chain pendant necklace
description: The Gucci Trademark line combines motifs and hexagonal bolt charms with the name of the House. From the cut-out heart to the padlock pendant, playful symbols continue to distinguish a selection of rings, necklaces, bracelets and earrings for Pre-Fall 2024. A Gucci Trademark engraved padlock, a cut-out Interlocking G and a Gucci Liftboy pendant adorn this sterling silver necklace.

name: Cotton jersey T-shirt
description: Transitioning into the warm season, new sets bring to mind a sartorial uniform enriched with subtle yet refined details, in cotton or jersey, in logo-detailed outerwear or knitwear. This regular fit T-shirt is made from a medium cotton jersey and reveals an Interlocking G shadow print on the front, and a Gucci crossword print on the reverse.

name: GG zip card case with GG detail
description: For the men's Fall Winter collection, signature small accessories are reintroduced in new colorways and combinations. Crafted from beige and ebony GG Supreme canvas, this zip card case is enriched with brass hardware with a ceramic-effect finishing.

name: GG zip card case with GG detail
description: For the men's Fall Winter collection, signature small accessories are reintroduced in new colorways and combinations. Crafted from beige and ebony GG Supreme canvas, this zip card case is enriched with brass hardware with a ceramic-effect finishing.

name: GG card case with GG detail
description: For the men's Fall Winter collection, signature small accessories are reintroduced in new colorways and combinations. Crafted from beige and ebony GG Supreme canvas, this card case is enriched with brass hardware with a ceramic-effect finishing. The accessory features several card slots on the inside.

name: GG passport case with GG detail
description: For the men's Fall Winter collection, signature small accessories are reintroduced in new colorways and combinations. Crafted from beige and ebony GG Supreme canvas, this passport case is enriched with brass hardware with a ceramic-effect finishing.

name: Cotton gabardine pant with Web
description: Emblematic codes of the House and refined patterns are reinterpreted in contemporary ways for the Pre-Fall collection. These pants with a regular fit are presented in cotton gabardine. The Gucci Web insert on the side slit pockets adds a twist, for a striking seasonal addition to your wardrobe.

name: Cotton jersey T-shirt with Gucci print
description: Emblematic codes of the House and refined patterns are reinterpreted in contemporary ways for the Pre-Fall collection. This oversized T-shirt is made from cotton jersey and features a print with Gucci symbols.

name: Cotton jersey T-shirt with Gucci print
description: Emblematic codes of the House and refined patterns are reinterpreted in contemporary ways for the Pre-Fall collection. This oversized T-shirt is made from a soft heavy cotton jersey and features a Gucci Firenze 1921 print and an Interlinking Gucci print.

name: Striped cotton poplin shirt
description: Creative Director Sabato De Sarno reinvents the essential men's wardrobe for the Pre-Fall 2024 collection, with wearabilty and fit becoming key statements. Here, this shirt is crafted from light blue and white striped cotton poplin.

name: GG rubber-effect bi-fold wallet
description: Revitalizing everyday small accessories with a modern-day interpretation, a selection of men's wallets appear in a rubber-effect leather. The new material for Cruise 2024 lends a contemporary feel to the essential item, featuring four card slots and a bill compartment.

name: Men's Screener sneaker with Web
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Inspired by classic trainers from the 1970s, the Screener sneaker is named after a defensive move in sports. For Pre-Fall 2024, this style is crafted in orange neoprene, a technical yet malleable material with an opaque appearance, featuring the Web stripe on the side and embossed Gucci logo on the heel.

name: GG print leather pant
description: Taking on the shape and style of the classic denim pant, this silhouette appears in precious leather with the GG print featuring allover. A five-pocket style defines the design, while the item can be paired with a matching jacket to complete the look.

name: Men's driver with Interlocking G
description: Designed with a sophisticated look, this driver loafer has a knot detail and the Interlocking G symbol on the side. Here it appears in blue suede with a rubber pebbled sole.

name: Men's driver with Interlocking G
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Designed with a sophisticated look, this driver loafer has a knot detail and the Interlocking G symbol on the side. Here it appears in oatmeal suede with a rubber pebbled sole.

name: GG Crystal duffle bag
description: This matte GG Crystal canvas is defined by the sporty and pliant nature of the material, making it perfect for daily wear. For the men's Spring Summer 2024 collection, Gucci introduces a matte variation with monochromatic GG motif, for a contemporary take on signature pieces. Here it defines this duffle bag with an Interlocking G and stripes rubber detail.

name: GG tri-fold wallet with GG detail
description: For the men's Fall Winter collection, signature small accessories are reintroduced in new colorways and combinations. Crafted from beige and ebony GG Supreme canvas, this tri-fold wallet is enriched with brass hardware with a ceramic-effect finishing. An ivory leather trim completes the accessory.

name: Interlocking G striped wool pant
description: In addition to the classic double-breasted suit, the Spring Summer 2024 collection also presents new proportions, from 3/4-sleeve blazers, to flared or wide leg trousers with a lower waist, shifting the focus on essential colors and luxurious materials. This men's pant is crafted from a Interlocking G striped wool jacquard and presented in grey and black.

name: Wool mohair formal pant
description: Classic designs appear throughout the Gucci universe, adding a different dimension and versatility to the latest collections. This pair of pants in dark blue wool mohair is completed with two side pockets and two back pockets.

name: Wool mohair formal pant
description: Classic designs appear throughout the Gucci universe, adding a different dimension and versatility to the latest collections. This pair of pants in black wool mohair is completed with two side pockets and two back pockets.

name: Ophidia small cabin trolley
description: An unmistakable combination of the House's most recognizable elements‚Äîthe GG motif and Web stripe. The Ophidia line continues to evolve as part of Cruise 2023 Gucci Cosmogonie, reinventing classic shapes in new colorways, resulting in a modern and refined offering. This small cabin trolley appears in modern grey and black GG Supreme canvas.

name: Gucci Savoy medium duffle bag
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Reflecting the Creative Director's contemporary vision, the Ophidia lines come to life with a pop of fluorescent fuchsia. Combining the GG motif and Web stripe with a modern hue launches signature travel pieces into the metropolis, such as this Gucci Savoy duffle bag.

name: Gucci Savoy large duffle bag
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Reflecting the Creative Director's contemporary vision, the Ophidia lines come to life with a pop of fluorescent orange. Combining the GG motif and Web stripe with a modern hue launches signature travel pieces into the metropolis, such as this Gucci Savoy duffle bag.

name: GG2570 watch, 41mm
description: Featuring a geometric design with a 1970s influence, this watch is completed with a brushed and polished squared-off stainless steel bezel, giving the style a sporty feel.

name: Oversize washed T-shirt with Gucci logo
description: An oversize T-shirt style made in washed cotton jersey with small holes in the fabric for a vintage effect. The House updates the Gucci vintage logo in an unexpected way, inspired by vintage prints from the eighties.

name: Oversize washed T-shirt with Gucci logo
description: The House brings the Gucci logo to the forefront, inspired by vintage prints from the eighties. The retro-style motif is presented on an oversize T-shirt style made in washed cotton jersey with small holes in the fabric for a vintage effect.

name: GG Marmont leather money clip
description: A leather money clip, distinguished by our signature Double G hardware. Made in calfskin leather, heat-stamped to achieve a boar effect, giving it a textured appearance.

name: Gucci Jordaan GG velvet loafer
description: The Gucci Jordaan loafer is now updated in black GG velvet‚Äîa distinctive fabric taken from the House archives. Defined by the Horsebit detail, a historical Gucci code, the key silhouette pays homage to the equestrian world and evolves from the classic penny loafer.

name: Men's Gucci Jordaan GG velvet loafer
description: Designed with an elongated toe and streamlined silhouette, the Gucci Jordaan embodies the refined craftsmanship of the loafer combined with distinct House codes. Since the introduction of its classic shape in the 1950s, the preppy-inspired shoe has continued its influence, redesigned in new forms and materials. Made in GG velvet‚Äîa distinctive fabric taken from the archives‚Äîthe shoe is outlined with blue leather and topped with the Horsebit.

name: Men's Gucci Jordaan loafer
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. The Horsebit detail, introduced in 1953 especially for the loafers of that era, defines this white loafer for men. Completed by a leather sole, the shoe is crafted in dotted canvas.

name: Web slide sandal
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. A casual rubber slide sandal with our Web detail.

name: Men's Web rubber slide sandal
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. A distinctive House code, the green and red Web is reimagined in a pop inspired take on this flat sandal, a slip-on design crafted from black rubber.

name: Men's Ace embroidered sneaker
description: The Ace low-top sneaker in leather is embellished with the gold embroidered bee against the Web stripe. The bee is an archival code first introduced in Gucci ready-to-wear in the 1970s.

name: Men's Ace embroidered sneaker
description: The Ace low-top sneaker in leather features the House's gold embroidered bee set against the Web. The bee is an archival code first introduced in Gucci ready-to-wear in the 1970s.

name: Web and leather thong sandal
description: Originally inspired by the equestrian world, the Web takes on new forms this season. Here the stripe motif adds contrast to a lug sole thong sandal.

name: GG Marmont leather card case
description: A fold-over card case, distinguished by our signature Double G hardware. Made in calfskin leather heat-stamped to achieve a boar effect, giving it a textured appearance.

name: GG Marmont leather bi-fold wallet
description: A bi-fold wallet, distinguished by our signature Double G hardware. Made in calfskin leather heat-stamped to achieve a boar effect, giving it a textured appearance.

name: GG Marmont leather bi-fold wallet
description: Monochrome color palettes infuse designs with a minimalist feel, allowing them to be paired and styled freely. This black leather wallet encapsulates the GG Marmont line with emblematic Double G hardware.

name: GG Marmont leather bi-fold wallet
description: A bi-fold wallet, distinguished by our signature Double G hardware. Made in calfskin leather heat-stamped to achieve a boar effect, giving it a textured appearance.

name: Men's Princetown Leather slipper
description: Soft leather slipper with our symbolic gold-tone Horsebit detail.

name: GG Marmont thin belt
description: The GG Marmont belt continues to enrich each new collection with its streamlined design. Inspired by an archival design from the 1970s, the line's monogram Double G hardware is presented in a shiny silver tone atop this black leather variation.

name: GG Marmont thin belt
description: The GG Marmont belt continues to enrich each new collection with its streamlined design. Inspired by an archival design from the 1970s, the line's monogram Double G hardware is presented in a shiny silver tone atop this brown leather variation.

name: GG Marmont leather belt with shiny buckle
description: The emblematic Double G is reintroduced for Pre-Fall 2020 in a luminous gold-tone, set on a men's smooth black leather belt.

name: GG Marmont thin belt
description: Monochrome styles appear throughout the Aria collection, adding a minimalist feel to classic accessories. Here, the GG Marmont belt is presented in black leather with a tonal Double G buckle.

name: GG Marmont thin belt
description: A slim leather belt with our signature Double G buckle. Made in smooth leather.

name: Gucci Signature leather belt
description: The Interlocking G buckle belt, made in heat debossed Gucci Signature leather with a defined print and firm texture.

name: GG Supreme belt with G buckle
description: A GG Supreme canvas belt finished with an interlocking G buckle.

name: GG Supreme belt with G buckle
description: Our GG Supreme canvas is offered in a beige and blue combination, finished with an interlocking G buckle.

name: GG Supreme belt with G buckle
description: A GG Supreme canvas belt finished with interlocking G buckle.

name: Tapered washed jeans
description: Gucci makes a strong statement in denim, reworking the cult fabric in different shapes and treatments. These stonewashed marbled jeans in a tapered silhouette set the groundwork for an individualized style.

name: Tapered washed jeans
description: Gucci makes a strong statement in denim, reworking the cult fabric in different shapes and treatments. These dark blue washed jeans in a tapered silhouette set the groundwork for an individualized style.

name: Men's Gucci Jordaan loafer
description: The traditional loafer is reimagined through the Gucci lens with unique details that reference the House. Taking inspiration from its equestrian roots, the silhouette is presented here in soft brown suede with a gold-toned Horsebit detail.

name: Bee earrings with Interlocking G
description: The bee‚Äîa symbol first used by Gucci in the '70s‚Äîis brought back into the forefront and established as a key code of the House. The design is made in metal with an aged gold finish and enriched with aged crystals at the wings. A large cream resin pearl makes up the body, with the interlocking G detail at the center. The bee charm earrings hang from crystal encrusted Interlocking Gs.

name: Icon 18k thin band
description: The emblematic GG pattern, symbolic of Guccio Gucci's initials, is engraved onto this thin Icon ring crafted from 18k rose gold.

name: GG Running stud earrings
description: The Double G, inspired by an archival design from the '70s-a hallmark era of the House-is elevated in 18k yellow gold with a scalloped outline.

name: GG Running stud earrings
description: Clean lines with an elegant feel, these 18k white gold GG stud earrings add a classic touch. Formed by the initials of the House's Founder Guccio Gucci, the distinctive code pays homage to the brand's heritage.

name: Large tote bag with Web stripe
description: Defined by Web stripes and the Gucci logo, large canvas bags evoke a warm-weather feeling. This camel canvas design, with a brown leather trim, features versatile straps and a spacious interior for multiple use.

name: Small tote bag with hook closure
description: This small tote design continues to feature the snap hook closure, inspired by the styles first presented in Spring Summer 2024. The sophisticated leather in ivory has a distinctive natural grain. This top handle bag holds daily essentials, and is ideal for any occasion with its detachable and adjustable shoulder strap.

name: Women's high-heeled pump
description: This classic pump silhouette is crafted in silk satinand defined by a wrap-around ankle closure and shiny crystals. The point toe complete the style with a bold touch.

name: GG super mini shoulder bag
description: The new GG canvas lends itself to this streamlined super mini shoulder bag. Appearing in black, the accessory is framed by a tonal leather trim and features a light gold-toned hardware.

name: GG rubber-effect super mini bag
description: A selection of bags, including mini cross-body bags, briefcases and totes have been reshaped with functional details. Crafted from black GG rubber-effect leather, this super mini bag features two inside card slots and an adjustable shoulder strap.

name: Wool jacquard skirt
description: Monochromatic styles appear throughout the latest collection, and this skirt is no exception. Presented in a grey and ivory wool jacquard, it is enriched with a Gucci intarsia and a rib trim.

name: Stretch rib viscose polo top
description: Inspired by the summer spirit and beach clubs on the Italian coast, this item is part of Gucci Lido. Tops and bottoms from jersey to denim and other materials open up numerous styling possibilities. This polo top appears in a stretch rib viscose, allowing for easy movement and wear. Round Interlocking G buttons complete the design with a refined nod to the House.

name: Extra fine wool and silk rib top
description: An essential part of the Pre-Fall collection's ready-to-wear-offering, knitwear with a fine touch and rich texture makes an ideal transition into the new season. This clean-cut top is presented in a fine wool and silk rib and defined by a subtle Gucci intarsia along the neckline.

name: Gucci Bamboo 1947 mini top handle bag
description: With its unique features such as the hand-curved bamboo handle, closure and a mirror in its own leather holder, Gucci Bamboo 1947 embodies the House‚Äôs signature style and artisanal excellence. Exclusively available via Client Advisors and in selected stores.

name: Gucci Bamboo 1947 mini top handle bag
description: With its unique features such as the hand-curved bamboo handle, closure and a mirror in its own leather holder, Gucci Bamboo 1947 embodies the House‚Äôs signature style and artisanal excellence. Exclusively available via Client Advisors and in selected stores.

name: Gucci Bamboo 1947 mini top handle bag
description: With its unique features such as the hand-curved bamboo handle, closure and a mirror in its own leather holder, Gucci Bamboo 1947 embodies the House‚Äôs signature style and artisanal excellence. Exclusively available via Client Advisors and in selected stores.

name: Chunky rib cotton dress
description: Relaxed yet chic, this soft polo top offers a versatile choice. Presented in a dark blue chunky rib cotton, it is enriched with raglan short sleeves and defined by a knitted Gucci label at the hem.

name: Extra fine rib wool and silk cardigan
description: An essential part of the Pre-Fall collection's ready-to-wear-offering, knitwear with a fine touch and rich texture makes an ideal transition into the new season. This streamlined cardigan is presented in a fine wool and silk rib and defined by a subtle Gucci intarsia.

name: Extra fine rib wool and silk cardigan
description: An essential part of the Pre-Fall collection's ready-to-wear-offering, knitwear with a fine touch and rich texture makes an ideal transition into the new season. This streamlined cardigan is presented in a fine rib wool and silk and defined by a subtle Gucci intarsia.

name: GG damier print silk skirt
description: Sophisticated and subtle patterns decorate a selection of styles for the Cruise 2024 collection. Classic elements still permeate the House's aesthetic, blending seamlessly with the contemporary for an updated yet never-out-of-style wardrobe. The House's historical monogram is presented here across a silk base, bringing an elegant twist to the silhouette.

name: Women's slide espadrille with GG crystals
description: The GG denim line expands to include a range of women's shoes for the new season. Three different GG denim shades in light blue, dark blue and black add texture to staple House styles. This variation on the material is enriched with black GG crystals atop this slide espadrille.

name: GG Horsebit silk scarf
description: The House's heritage motifs shine through eye-catching new prints. Here, this silk scarf features a GG Horsebit, stirrup and chain print, demonstrating Gucci's design inspirations from the equestrian world. A black trim completes the elegant accessory.

name: Gucci Horsebit Chain small shoulder bag
description: Gucci successfully recalls its past by connecting the archives to the present day. Adorned with a maxi Horsebit, first made popular during the early ‚Äò2000s, this silhouette continues to be one of the most recognizable handbags of the House. Revisited for the Fall Winter 2023 collection, it is presented in various colors and textures that follow a contemporary approach.

name: Zip around wallet with bamboo
description: Paying homage to a material at the heart of Gucci‚Äôs heritage, this zip around wallet features a bamboo zip closure. Crafted from brown leather, the accessory is completed by a gold-toned Double G monogram hardware.

name: Oversized geometric optical frame
description: A pair of geometric-frame sunglasses crafted from gold-toned metal. The Interlocking G features as a subtle detail alongside an enamel Web stripe, imbuing the design with a delicate logo feel.

name: GG Matelass√© card case
description: Matelass√© leather continues to come to the fore in unique ways each season. With a super soft finish, the signature material is reimagined with a textured geometric motif as a part of the small leather accessories line. The design presents a contemporary approach to the '90s logo trend, here it defines a black card case.

name: GG Matelass√© chain wallet
description: Matelass√© leather continues to come to the fore in unique ways each season. With a super soft finish, the signature material is reimagined with a textured geometric motif as a part of the small leather accessories line. The design presents a contemporary approach to the '90s logo trend, here it defines a light pink chain mini bag.

name: GG Matelass√© chain wallet
description: Matelass√© leather continues to come to the fore in unique ways each season. With a super soft finish, the signature material is reimagined with a textured geometric motif as a part of the small leather accessories line. The design presents a contemporary approach to the '90s logo trend, here it defines a black chain wallet.

name: GG Matelass√© card case wallet
description: Matelass√© leather continues to come to the fore in unique ways each season. With a super soft finish, the signature material is reimagined with a textured geometric motif as a part of the small leather accessories line. The design presents a contemporary approach to the '90s logo trend, here it defines a black card case wallet.

name: GG Matelass√© zip-around wallet
description: Matelass√© leather continues to come to the fore in unique ways each season. With a super soft finish, the signature material is reimagined with a textured geometric motif as a part of the small leather accessories line. The design presents a contemporary approach to the '90s logo trend, here it defines a black zip-around wallet.

name: Cotton jersey printed T-shirt
description: A relaxed attitude speaks volume as casual pieces become indispensable. Sweatshirts, hoodies, and t-shirts with drop shoulders, cropped lengths, and generous fits are adorned with signature embellishments. Part of the selection, this women's T-shirt is crafted from off white cotton jersey and features an Interlocking G flock print.

name: Gucci Blondie thin belt
description: Self-expression defines Gucci collections, embracing the idea that there are no rules when it comes to dressing up. Playing with this theme, the accessories and pieces of ready-to-wear continue to reimagine and reintroduce heritage details. Here, this thin black belt is distinguished by an archival iteration of the House's monogram hardware.

name: Gucci Blondie thin belt
description: A heritage material from the archive, GG Supreme has been combined with contemporary as well as classic styles. This thin belt is presented in beige and ebony GG Supreme with a brown leather trim. A geometrically shaped Interlocking G logo defines the accessory.

name: Gucci Horsebit 1955 mini bag
description: This year, the Gucci Horsebit 1955 spotlights a sparkling iteration of its double ring and bar. The crystal-set hardware creates new visual contrast with the leather material in fresh colors. Here it decorates this light blue mini bag.

name: GG Marmont thin belt
description: The House's most emblematic motifs are portrayed as timeless yet ever-evolving symbols throughout the latest collection. The iconic gold-toned Double G defines the accessory, with its unmistakable touch.

name: Women's heeled metallic sandal
description: Crafted in metallic platinum leather, the high-heel sandal sports a subtle design with a thin heel and three front straps. A delicate crystal Double G buckle embellishes the ankle strap.

name: Women's heeled metallic sandal
description: Crafted in metallic silver leather, the high-heel sandal sports a subtle design with a thin heel and three front straps. A delicate crystal Double G buckle embellishes the ankle strap.

name: Ophidia GG small bucket bag
description: The world of Ophidia evolves with the introduction of a new bucket bag shape. Crafted in GG Supreme canvas with inlaid green and red Web stripe along the bottom. The accessory is completed with a single top handle and detachable shoulder strap for two different ways to wear it.

name: Original GG canvas baseball hat with Web
description: From the 1970s 'Gucci Tennis' sneaker to the present day, the House continues to express its connection to the sport with signature pieces focusing on heritage as well as innovation. This streamlined baseball hat is presented in Original GG cotton canvas and enhanced with a green and red Web stripe.

name: Ophidia GG small crossbody bag
description: The GG Supreme Tender canvas, with its soft material and durable characteristics, lends itself well to the men's accessories line, adding a modern feel to established House designs. This Ophidia crossbody bag is presented in a blue and dark blue variation of the GG Supreme Tender canvas, complete with the Double G hardware.

name: Wool jacquard cardigan with GG Shadow
description: Part of the men's Fall Winter 2024 collection, everyday ready-to-wear pieces are elevated thanks to high quality materials and impeccable craftsmanship. This cardigan appears in blue and burgundy GG knit wool jacquard recalling the House heritage.

name: Men's loafer with Horsebit
description: For the men's Fall Winter 2024 collection, essential silhouettes are enriched with emblematic details. Crafted from blue suede, this pair of loafers is defined by the signature Horsebit in silver-tone. A rubber lug sole completes the style.

name: Men's loafer with Horsebit
description: For the men's Fall Winter 2024 collection, essential silhouettes are enriched with emblematic details. Crafted from dark brown suede, this pair of loafers is defined by the signature Horsebit in silver-tone. A rubber lug sole completes the style.

name: Men's ankle boot with Horsebit
description: For the men's Fall Winter 2024 collection, essential silhouettes are enriched with emblematic details. Crafted from oatmeal suede, this pair of ankle boots is defined by the signature Horsebit in silver-tone. A rubber lug sole completes the style.

name: Men's ankle boot with Horsebit
description: For the men's Fall Winter 2024 collection, essential silhouettes are enriched with emblematic details. Crafted from dark brown suede, this pair of ankle boots is defined by the signature Horsebit in silver-tone. A rubber lug sole completes the style.

name: Men's Ace sneaker
description: Since its debut, the Ace sneaker has become a mainstay of the House's narrative. A new version of the characteristic low-top silhouette is presented in the latest collection, featuring unique details. Presented in Gucci Rosso Ancora red nylon, the accessory is completed with a green and red Web.

name: Men's Ace sneaker
description: Since its debut, the Ace sneaker has become a mainstay of the House's narrative. A new version of the characteristic low-top silhouette is presented in the latest collection, featuring unique details. Presented in black nylon, the accessory is completed with a green and red Web.

description: The Pre-Fall 2024 eyewear collection successfully combines the coveted silhouettes of bygone decades with a contemporary logo feel. Here, a shiny silver metal frame pairs with a Web detail and Gucci logo.

name: Gucci Dive watch, 40mm

description: Emblematic codes of the House and refined patterns are reinterpreted in contemporary ways for the Pre-Fall collection. These chunky sneakers are crafted from a breathable bicolor mesh and reveal a contrasting Interlocking G and lightning rubber detail for a hi-tech feel.

name: Men's Gucci Ripple sneaker

name: GG rubber-effect medium duffle bag

name: Women's Gucci Ace sneaker with Web
description: Since its debut, the Ace sneaker has become a mainstay of the House's narrative. A new version of the characteristic low-top silhouette is presented in the latest collection, featuring unique details. This style features a pink GG Supreme canvas, complete with tonal Web stripe.

name: Ophidia mini tote bag
description: The Ophidia line is further elevated through new sizes and styles, like this mini tote bag which has a detachable pouch and detachable leather shoulder strap, allowing for versatile wear. The beige and white GG Supreme canvas is complete with light gold-toned Double G hardware.

name: Ophidia mini tote bag
description: The Ophidia line is further elevated through new sizes and styles, like this mini tote bag which has a detachable pouch and detachable leather shoulder strap, allowing for versatile wear. The beige and ebony GG Supreme canvas is complete with light gold-toned Double G hardware.

name: Ophidia cabin trolley
description: The GG Supreme canvas is a signature throughout Gucci's travel selection. The material has been reinterpreted in fresh dusty pink shades on this Ophidia cabin trolley for the new season. Create an elegant luggage set by matching this accessory with the travel bag of the same line.

name: Ophidia small beauty case
description: The GG Supreme canvas is a signature throughout Gucci's travel selection. The material has been reinterpreted in fresh dusty blue shades on this Ophidia beauty case for the new season. name: Cashmere short
description: The Fall Winter 2024 collection re-envisions traditional ready-to-wear through subtle yet innovative details. These straight-cut shorts are presented in a dark grey cashmere and completed with a Gucci embroidery.

name: GG embossed leather short
description: The Fall Winter 2024 collection reinterprets the iconic GG leather with new softness and the House motif embossed in a fresh dimension. These mini shorts are presented in a GG embossed leather and completed with a Hook closure with Gucci engraving.

name: Leather with bleach effect short
description: The Fall Winter 2024 collection re-envisions traditional ready-to-wear through subtle yet innovative details. These straight-cut shorts have been crafted from a dark green leather with bleach effect and are defined by a Gucci embossed detail.

name: Batavia wool short
description: The Fall Winter 2024 collection re-envisions traditional ready-to-wear through subtle yet innovative details. These batavia wool shorts are defined by a Gucci embroidery, Gucci metal detail on the waistband and Gucci zip puller, exploring fresh ways to present the House codes.

name: Leather with bleached effect coat
description: In the Women's Fall Winter 2024 collection, outerwear blends traditional tailoring with contemporary details, embodying meticulous craftsmanship and modern aesthetic. With a new focus on yarns, these knits can be worn alone as a standout piece, or layered to complement the Fall Winter 2024 wardrobe. This mini dress is presented in a chunky rib wool with a tonal rib trim.

name: GG beauty case
description: This beauty case has a sleek tubular silhouette and is adorned with the iconic Double G logo on the front. Made from GG leather, it includes a leather shoulder strap for easy carrying. The interior features a mirror and elastic bands to secure your beauty products.

name: GG beauty case
